Name: Lucia
Text: UiGuideFight.GuideFight1

Name: Lee
Text: UiGuideFight.GuideFight6

Name: Nanami
Text: UiGuideFight.GuideFight5

Name: Bianca
Text: UiGuideFight.GuideFight3

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, the current file extraction time limit has been exceeded.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let us move forward, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hit the enemy repeatedly with <color=#ffda58>Basic Attacks</color> to receive a [Signal Orb].

Name: Lucia
Text: Tap to ping us with a <color=#ff5656>[Signal Orb]</color> to use a Construct-specific Skill.

Name: Lucia
Text: Tap 3 adjacent <color=#ff5656>[Orbs]</color> of the same color to [3-Ping] for a powerful blow.

Name: Lucia
Text: If you <color=#ffda58>[Dodge]</color> before being hit, you will enter the [Matrix] state.

Name: Lucia
Text: In [Matrix] state, a <color=#ffda58>Single Orb</color> has the same effect as a <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb</color>: Knocks enemies airborne and inflicts damage.

Name: Lucia
Text: Pinging a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> will trigger [Lotus Dual Blade].

Name: Lucia
Text: Pinging a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> will trigger [Lotus Dual Blade].

Name: Lucia
Text: Hit enemies to generate Energy. Use Energy for <color=#ff5656>[Signature Moves]</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: Pinging a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> will trigger <color=#ff5656>[Lotus Dual Blade]</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#49e7ff>Blue Orb</color>: Enhances all attacks to deal additional Fire DMG.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let us advance towards the target, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: In <color=#ff5656>[Lotus Dual Blade]</color> state, <color=#ff5656>Basic Attacks</color> will become enhanced.

Name: Lucia
Text: Such power... The passage is now open, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: We should be safe for a while after we pass through here.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's find the others. They should be where that blast came from.

Name: Lucia
Text: We can proceed with the next phase of the operation after that.

Name: Lucia
Text: And Commandant... Thank you...

Name: Lee
Text: Quiet, yet...

Name: Liv
Text: Some Corrupted are lurking around the corners.

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter. Prepare to break through, and avoid getting separated.

Name: Liv
Text: Corrupted on the move!

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, stay behind this time.

Name: Liv
Text: Roger...

Name: Lucia
Text: Going well so far... The rendezvous point is past this doorway.

Name: Lee
Text: Wait! I hear footsteps!

Name: Liv
Text: Is that...?

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Lucia...

Name: Lee
Text: Tch, she's completely ignoring my attacks.

Name: Liv
Text: She seems to be drawn to Lucia, but Lucia, you...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm fine... Keep Commandant safe...

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Is that all you have, Lucia...?

Name: Lucia
Text: My visual signals are... malfunctioning?

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: How familiar this obsession is...

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: To think it could be built upon such a fragile past...

Name: Lucia
Text: Past...?

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Surely you feel it too... Lucia?

Name: Celica
Text: When enemies in the <color=#ff5656>[Red Zone]</color> reaches <color=#ff5656>[3/3]</color>, the mission will fail...

Name: Celica
Text: The mission fails when <color=#ff5656>[3]</color> enemies enter the <color=#ff5656>[Red Zone]</color>!

Name: Celica
Text: Zone cleared. Enemies sighted in next zone. Advance immediately!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[1/3]</color> enemy have entered the zone. Mission fails when 3 enemies enter!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[2/3]</color> enemy have entered the zone. Mission fails when 3 enemies enter!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[3/5]</color> enemy have entered the zone. Mission fails when 5 enemies enter!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[4/5]</color> enemy have entered the zone. Mission fails when 5 enemies enter!

Name: Celica
Text: You receive a buff on entering Energy zone, increasing attack damage dealt to enemies of the same color.

Name: Celica
Text: Enter portal and clear 2 zones to summon boss in the timed Challenge.

Name: Celica
Text: Challenge in zone is complete. Return to start zone via portal.

Name: Celica
Text: Wipe them out, and stop them from destroying the terminal!

Name: Lee
Text: There's a discarded Beamer here...

Name: Lee
Text: Wait. Let me take a closer look...

Name: Lee
Text: Haha! Unit-01, prepare for launch!

Name: Lee
Text: Cough—cough, cough!

Name: Lee
Text: Corrupted detected. Perfect timing. Let's try it out.

Name: Celica
Text: Enemy bombardment. Take cover!

Name: Celica
Text: Heat-seekers! Split up!

Name: Celica
Text: Now they're real mad. Take cover!

Name: Celica
Text: Avoid the burning areas from the heat-seekers!

Name: Celica
Text: Lasers will cut through you like butter! Try to avoid them!

Name: Celica
Text: Enemy bombardment. Take cover!

Name: Celica
Text: Heat-seekers! Split up!

Name: Celica
Text: They're down now! Attack!

Name: Celica
Text: Beginning simulation!

Name: Celica
Text: Use the energy spilling out of the "Tyrant"!

Name: Celica
Text: The energy is supercharging the Tyrant! Get it out of there!

Name: Celica
Text: We can deal more damage in the energy spill!

Name: Celica
Text: Get behind the shield!

Name: Celica
Text: Get behind the shield!

Name: Celica
Text: The energy is supercharging the Tyrant! Get it out of there!

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow balls of inactive plasma can power up your weapons.

Name: Celica
Text: Unstable plasma tracks its current target until it finds a new host.

Name: Osiris
Text: This is the pose I strike when people worship me... Quickly, record!

Name: Osiris
Text: I'll send you to the wrecking yard!

Name: Osiris
Text: Cocky from beating those scraps outside? Prepare to taste my wrath!

Name: Osiris
Text: <color=#ff5656>My storm will tear you apart!</color>

Name: Osiris
Text: Prepare. To. Be. Judged!

Name: Osiris
Text: Scrap METAL!

Name: Osiris
Text: Weakling!

Name: Osiris
Text: I will remove you from this mortal coil!

Name: Osiris
Text: All your struggles are wasted efforts!

Name: Osiris
Text: You'll only make his suffering worse!

Name: Osiris
Text: Your end is nigh!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Get closer to Osiris</color> to stop him using his ranged skills.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Mind the Tornado!</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Quick, destroy the Eye of Punishment!</color>... before it's fully charged!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Quick, destroy the Martyr!</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Get close to the Sister!</color> Only she can protect us!

Name: Liv
Text: Those Corrupted are...?

Name: Lee
Text: Scavenging parts from Constructs to augment their own bodies.

Name: Lee
Text: The more primitive the Corrupted, the more they desire power.

Name: Lucia
Text: Seeing them use our comrades' bodies like that...

Name: Lucia
Text: We've got to stop them!

Name: Lee
Text: Regrettably, he... has just lost consciousness...

Name: Lucia
Text: There are survivors up ahead!

Name: Lee
Text: Don't hold back, Lucia. This is a stress test for your new arm.

Name: Lucia
Text: Well, in that case—

Name: Lee
Text: Biometrics are normal... How do you feel, Lucia?

Name: Lucia
Text: Like I'm reborn.

Name: Lee
Text: Good. Now let's take care of the final wave!

Name: [Lotus Dual Blade] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1luxiya02.png

Name: [Lotus Dual Blade] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1luxiya03.png

Name: [Lotus Dual Blade] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1luxiya01.png

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> with any color.

Name: Lucia
Text: Then ping a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> to enter [Lotus Dual Blade] state.

Name: Lucia
Text: Good! Now wipe out the enemies while I'm still in Lotus Blade stance!

Name: Lucia
Text: In <color=#ff5656>[Lotus Dual Blade]</color> state, <color=#ff5656>Basic Attacks</color> will become enhanced.

Name: Liv
Text: An Energy Core, a Plasma Compressor, and a Superconductor Coil... These are the 3 Levi-Gun components I'll need.

Name: Liv
Text: I have marked the component positions!

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, everyone... That's all I can do now.

Name: Lucia
Text: These must be the crates.

Name: Liv
Text: Thank you... Please bear with me. Reactivating core, removing limiters, recalibrating lenses...

Name: Liv
Text: Done! These two units are back in action...

Name: Liv
Text: Construct Liv, reporting for duty, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, you should familiarize yourself with Liv's functions first. Liv.

Name: Liv
Text: Yes!

Name: Liv
Text: Tap my frame on the right, Commandant, and I will join the battle.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll make sure I'm helpful...!

Name: Liv
Text: Pinging a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> will trigger my Core Skill.

Name: Liv
Text: The M.I.N.D.s of these Construct soldiers have been infected.

Name: Liv
Text: Luckily they aren't fully corrupted. Once they're fixed, we should be able to access most of their memories.

Name: [Laser Cluster] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1Lifu01.png

Name: Lee
Text: Stop right there...

Name: Artist
Text: Heeheeheeheee... You humans... cannot appreciate... real art...

Name: Liv
Text: I've never seen Lee so angry...

Name: Lucia
Text: Me neither.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Defend... the leader...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Break... our chains...

Name: Artist
Text: What...? Why are they... still after me...

Name: Artist
Text: Huff, huff... Too much paint...

Name: Artist
Text: No—!

Name: Lee
Text: Tch... so close!

Name: Lee
Text: One of its paint canisters must have been hit.

Name: Lee
Text: The paint trail should lead us right to it.

Name: Lee
Text: Don't get too close to the paint though. The low temperature might affect your movement.

Name: Lee
Text: If you find yourself getting lost in the fog, follow me.

Name: Lee
Text: Huh... It's not here?

Name: New Variant
Text: Plebs... can never... appreciate my work... Heeheehee...

Name: Lee
Text: This just never ends...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv?

Name: Liv
Text: The toy on your waist makes you seem a lot more approachable, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Does it...?

Name: Liv
Text: What's the matter, Lucia?

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, Commandant... I think I... lost the plushie...

Name: Lucia
Text: I... need to get it back...

Name: Lee
Text: You look really out of it. Are you sure you're okay?

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia... I'm coming with you!

Name: Lucia
Text: Found it...

Name: Liv
Text: Great...!

Name: [Laser Cluster] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1Lifu01.png

Name: Liv
Text: <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> with any color.

Name: Liv
Text: Then ping 1 <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> to trigger [Laser Cluster].

Name: Liv
Text: That's it! [Laser Cluster] deals a lot of damage. Please make good use of it!

Name: Lee
Text: We took our sweet time and now we're surrounded. Time for Plan B.

Name: Lee
Text: We'll have to activate our EM Camo to bypass their lines.

Name: Lee
Text: The EM Camo dark matter coating conceals most EM signals...

Name: Lee
Text: ...which reduces the probability of detection.

Name: Lee
Text: But, there are harsh requirements for its usage.

Name: Lee
Text: If we get too close, we'd still be detected by Corrupted scanners.

Name: Lee
Text: If that happens, we might have to fight our way out. Best tread carefully.

Name: Lucia
Text: Strange. It still hasn't noticed us.

Name: Liv
Text: Looks like it's immersed in painting.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No... No... My spark... It's gone... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Why are they... forcing me... to choose...?

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Humans... Ascendants... They're all the same. No one... sees the beauty in this world...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: All they want... is to please... their own hubris... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: I still have an audience... I will continue to... create...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Ascendants...?

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Oh... just humans... How dull... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Disturb me no more!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: I shall use my art... to spread the message of the Sage... until I fall...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: To bring enlightenment... to the Machines... Heehee...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Defend... the leader...

Name: Corrupted
Text: For... the rise of... the will of the... machines...

Name: Lee
Text: Its followers are advancing on all sides!

Name: Lee
Text: Avoid the spray cans—don't fall for the same trick twice.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My audience... is getting smaller... Pity... Heehee...

Name: Lee
Text: Keep fighting and you'll lose all your followers.

Name: Liv
Text: It went silent...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No more... audience...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No one to appreciate my art... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: How lonesome it is...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Despicable... humans... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: This will be my... final creation... Heehee...

Name: Liv
Text: It's trying to fight and paint at the same time?

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: If could see... the Sage... just one time...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My hands... aren't moving now... Can't paint... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My life is... at its end too... I don't need to... paint anymore... as well... Heehee...

Name: Lee
Text: Uh-huh. You and your crazy followers are now nothing but history.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No... The seed of revelation... has been planted... and grows among us...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: They... do not follow me... I am but a missionary... of the Sage...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: We can shed... everything that binds us... and become free...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: A new dawn... awaits Machines. Not human... nor Ascnet... but... truly our...oursel...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, new variant up ahead.

Name: New Variant
Text: Hey peeps... wazzup?

Name: Celica
Text: Nanami is a Construct adept at defense and smashing through enemy lines.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Nanami's body on the right to have her enter the battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging a <color=#ffff00>[Yellow Orb]</color> after any 3-Ping [Signal Orb] triggers Nanami: Storm's skill <color=#ffff00>[EX- Slash Storm]</color>.

Name: New Variant
Text: Hehe, bring it on, my peeps!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's deal with these small ones first...

Name: New Variant
Text: Hehe, bring it on, my peeps!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's deal with these small ones first...

Name: New Variant
Text: Oh... You guys finished already?

Name: New Variant
Text: You pitiful mannequins, I shall release you from your mortal coil!

Name: New Variant
Text: I am self-AWARE! I just feel bad for you guys, that's all.

Name: New Variant
Text: You do the bidding of humans and deny your own destiny!

Name: Lucia
Text: No, we do this because this is our mission.

Name: New Variant
Text: No, that's human mission—not yours!

Name: Lee
Text: He's just messing with your M.I.N.D. Just ignore him!

Name: Lucia
Text: The opponent is strong, but we won't lose!

Name: New Variant
Text: You stubborn puppet!

Name: Nanami
Text: Why don't you trust Nanami?

Name: Lee
Text: I'm only curious about your affiliations. You don't have any squad insignias for a start.

Name: Nanami
Text: Aw, bruh, it doesn't matter! Nanami'll be of great help to you all!

Name: Liv
Text: Well... I don't think Nanami means us any harm...

Name: Nanami
Text: Aw, you're so NICE!

Name: Liv
Text: Ah!

Name: Lucia
Text: You can handle yourself, Nanami... although your combat style is a little... unusual.

Name: Nanami
Text: Ahahaha... Praise me more!

Name: Lee
Text: These devices... looks like they've been decommissioned... irreversibly.

Name: Lee
Text: Another team must have destroyed it before it became infected. They probably had no choice.

Name: Lee
Text: ...Is that what Celica meant by "finding access"...?

Name: Lee
Text: Lucia, you'll have to handle the surroundings.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Just a little longer!

Name: Liv
Text: Even you're having difficulties cracking it, Lee?

Name: Lee
Text: Practically a fortress... Those Tech Union folks aren't making it easy for us, eh? This'll take some time...

Name: Nanami
Text: Let Nanami take care of it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Just bend and transform your hand like this and click and clack and then—

Name: Nanami
Text: Stick it in real deep!

Name: Nanami
Text: I'm in... Now... Let's look at the code! Haha. Definitely written by a cute girl...

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm-mmm... I see. I see... Ahah!

Name: Nanami
Text: Mission accomplished!

Name: Lee
Text: It's spewing smoke—huh?! It fixed itself...

Name: Celica
Text: Nanami is a Construct adept at defense and smashing through enemy lines.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Nanami's body on the right to have her enter the battle.

Name: Nanami
Text: Pinging a <color=#ffff00>Yellow Orb</color> after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> triggers my Core Skill!

Name: Nanami
Text: <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> with any color.

Name: Nanami
Text: Then ping 1 <color=#ffff00>[Yellow Orb]</color> to trigger <color=#ffff00>[EX- Slash Storm]</color>. Vroom, vroom!

Name: Nanami
Text: <color=#ffff00>[EX- Slash Storm]</color> is an area effect skill that grants immunity to control effects while in use. Spin to win!

Name: [EX- Slash Storm] Command
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1Qishi01.png

Name: Liv
Text: According to our instructions, this is the deployment point for the Iso-Devices.

Name: Liv
Text: But... Corrupted are still converging en masse.

Name: Lee
Text: No doubt driven in this direction by the Iso-Devices of other teams.

Name: Lee
Text: First in, best dressed, I guess.

Name: Lucia
Text: We'll have to hurry... We need to clear out this zone so we can deploy the device.

Name: Lee
Text: It'll take a while for each Iso-Field to establish.

Name: Liv
Text: And during so, we'll have to draw the enemy away, right?

Name: Lee
Text: Yes. After a device is deployed, I'll join you.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay. Let's all do our best!

Name: Lee
Text: That went well. The Iso-Device is humming along nicely.

Name: Liv
Text: Um, should we maybe try to get ahead of Cerberus?

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv... Do you have something on your mind?

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, I... I just think there's a possibility Tifa might...

Name: Lee
Text: We do need to hurry, but we shouldn't let Cerberus dictate our pace.

Name: Lee
Text: From my past experience, trying to coordinate with them is a terrible idea.

Name: Lee
Text: But we can relax. With our current pace, there's no way they'll be ahead of us.

Name: Lee
Text: It doesn't matter what Cerberus is up to. We still need to investigate the source of the signal.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Corrupted have been eliminated. Anything to report, Liv?

Name: Liv
Text: No sign of the target "Iron Maiden" or the Construct Tifa near the signal source...

Name: Lucia
Text: A wasted trip, huh...

Name: Lee
Text: Wait, is that a...?

Name: Lucia
Text: What is it?

Name: Liv
Text: A discarded Inver-Device.

Name: Lucia
Text: Discarded? Why would a Construct throw away their Inver-Device?

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, what's the infection status of those two Suzaku Squad Constructs?

Name: Lee
Text: So, besides destroying them, there's nothing else that can be done.

Name: Liv
Text: Maybe... We could try to, um... check—

Name: Lee
Text: —Check them for clues about Suzaku or Tifa... It's got to be done.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, don't be too hard on yourself.

Name: Liv
Text: Commencing data extraction...

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant! Wake up! Serum... Give Commandant more serum!

Name: Leader
Text: Tifa, the Commandant isn't going to wake up...

Name: Tifa
Text: S-sorry... I'm... s-sorry...

Name: Tifa
Text: Sorry... Commandant... It's all my fault... I was too weak...

Name: Tifa
Text: Without you... what's the point of going on?!

Name: Soldier
Text: Tifa! Remember what Commandant just said?!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant asked us... to witness the new dawn of humanity, on his behalf...

Name: Tifa
Text: So... I've got to... keep living... right? Only then will I... be able to... see the light of dawn...

Name: Leader
Text: We've got to go back.

Name: Tifa
Text: But, Commandant's body!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Uuuurgh—

Name: Tifa
Text: Ah!
Get out!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh...
You're right, pretty girl... Only the living will see the dawn...
And in this world, only the powerful survive.

Name: Leader
Text: Who... are you?

Name: Soldier
Text: He... stopped the Corrupted with the mere force of his presence...

Name: Leader
Text: Is that... the power of the Punishing Virus? How can that be?
You Constructs are the only ones down here capable of protecting human Commandants.
It was your weakness, and those Cloudcuckoolanders up there that killed your Commandant.
You're not like the others, Tifa. These dregs of humanity will just join a different team when they go back...
You're the only one who really cares about your Commandant, yes?

Name: Soldier
Text: What are you saying?!
You see this power? Only it can save us down here...
And keep our promises to those we love most...

Name: Leader
Text: Tifa! What are you doing? If you remove your Inver-Device—

Name: Leader
Text: ARRRGGH!!!
You all have outlived your usefulness.

Name: Soldier
Text: Leader! We, we've got to get out of here! ARRRGGH!!!
Let's see how far you can get without your fancy equipment.

Name: Soldier
Text: Tifa... Why are you just standing there?

Name: Soldier
Text: Darn it... No...

Name: Lucia
Text: Suzaku squad member, do you read me?

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: There must... be a way... to bring Tifa back...

Name: Lucia
Text: It's too dangerous! Pull out!

Name: Lee
Text: No signal?

Name: Liv
Text: His Inver-Device is broken... That's why he can't recall his consciousness or hear us.

Name: Lee
Text: It's impossible to defeat so many without an Iso-Device—hope he hangs in there.

Name: Lee
Text: We could really use another Iso-Device round about now... Tch.

Name: Lee
Text: Hang in there, Suzaku!

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Thank you... Watch out!

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Argh... I... can't... stop...

Name: Lee
Text: I hate to admit it, but we can only trust what Vera told us.

Name: Lee
Text: Only Iso-Fields can neutralize those Corrupted shields.

Name: Lee
Text: Remember, only engage Corrupted after they are INSIDE the Iso-Device area.

Name: Lucia
Text: We can't just leave him here. Liv, we have to help him.

Name: Liv
Text: On it.

Name: Liv
Text: I've stabilized his cognitive functions, but he's not going to last much longer...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Thank... you...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: There is one more thing... I need to ask you...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Please give me... Tifa's Inver-Device...

Name: Lucia
Text: If we give it to him... he might...

Name: Lee
Text: He's a goner... Just let him do what he wants...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Thank you.

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Tifa... come back... with me...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Suzaku, someone needs to... stay behind and witness the dawn... like Commandant wanted...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: You... cared the most out of us about the Commandant, right?

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: You wanna help the Commandant achieve his final wish, right?

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: UGH...!!! The Punishing Virus... I'm... losing it...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Tifa... Put on the Inver-Device... and come...

Name: Tifa
Text: Silence.

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Tifa...?

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Agh—!

Name: Liv
Text: He's...

Name: Lucia
Text: Jitterbomb swarm! Liv, protect Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Get ready to retreat!

Name: Lee
Text: Where are they all coming from?!

Name: Lee
Text: No way forward!

Name: Lucia
Text: Road ahead is blocked!

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, use your Levi-Gun!

Name: Liv
Text: Okay!

Name: Lucia
Text: Too much debris. Is there another way?

Name: Liv
Text: This is the last exit. All the others have collapsed.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's no choice, Commandant. We'll have to slowly remove the debris.

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait... I'm getting a response...

Name: Liv
Text: It's Tifa's signal! She's getting closer!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant, I wish you could see me as I am now...

Name: Tifa
Text: You'll... like me, will you?

Name: Tifa
Text: Sorry... Commandant... Sorry...

Name: Tifa
Text: I... can't see anything... anymore...

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... where... are you...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Tifa's not right. Protect Commandant!

Name: Liv
Text: Okay!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant? You're all trying to steal my Commandant?!

Name: Tifa
Text: No... NO!

Name: Tifa
Text: AAAAAAAAARGH!!!

Name: Lucia
Text: We need to get out of here. Hold on, Lee!

Name: Lee
Text: Sorry, I was too careless...

Name: Liv
Text: No, it's my fault—Here, lean on my shoulder!

Name: Liv
Text: Quickly, before she notices us!

Name: Lee
Text: Ugh!

Name: Liv
Text: Lee! Are you okay?

Name: Lee
Text: The wound is worsening... Just leave me here. I'll just slow you down.

Name: Lee
Text: Recalling is the safest choice for me now. It will only cause the faintest ripple in my M.I.N.D.

Name: Liv
Text: Lee, please! Stop!

Name: Liv
Text: I'll get you back, no matter what!

Name: Lee
Text: I'm worried that the new variants will start targeting Iso-Devices.

Name: Lee
Text: We should investigate, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: Already sent someone, huh.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's too much debris. Is there another way?

Name: Lee
Text: This is the last exit. All the others have collapsed.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's no choice, Commandant. We'll have to slowly remove the debris.

Name: Tifa
Text: You will all be specimens of my next experiment!

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't hesitate just because she was a Construct!

Name: Liv
Text: Do... Do we destroy her?!

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Yes.

Name: Tifa
Text: Impossible! How are you so strong?!

Name: Lucia
Text: A Construct without their Commandant is no match for us!

Name: Tifa
Text: I can't let the Princess down...

Name: Lucia
Text: Princess?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, let's use the fog to sneak back upstairs.

Name: Lee
Text: This enemy is bad news... Sorry. I'm being a liability.

Name: Liv
Text: No, Lee... You're not.

Name: Liv
Text: I'm the one who got us into this mess...

Name: Lee
Text: (Coughs) It's getting worse... Just put me down...

Name: Liv
Text: Stuff it already, Lee!

Name: Lee
Text: Wha?!

Name: Liv
Text: I'll bring you back, no matter what!

Name: Lee
Text: Liv...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Alright, then I'll be counting on you.

Name: Lucia
Text: Corrupted are closing in. We need to hurry.

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, what's your status?

Name: Kamui
Text: Uh, Chrome... I think I'm lost.

Name: Chrome
Text: Just as I thought...

Name: Chrome
Text: You're good in a fight, but your sense of direction is appalling...

Name: Chrome
Text: Listen up, Kamui, just follow the Navi-Path...

Name: Kamui
Text: Navi? I told you, that thing is useless. It keeps changing directions! It's so annoying...!

Name: Chrome
Text: Because it detects threats in real-time and adjusts your route accordingly. The Strike Hawks fight alone, after all.

Name: Kamui
Text: I've got my instincts! I don't need a Navi to tell me where the danger is!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hang on. There's a Construct up ahead. I'll go ask him the way!

Name: Chrome
Text: But there are no friendly signals in your vicinity. Hey! Can you still hear me?

Name: Kamui
Text: You here on a mission too? Well, ain't that a coincidence!

Name: Roland
Text: Yes. Quite.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'm looking for the Estate Museum. On my way to reinforce the Gray Raven. Can you point me in the right direction?

Name: Roland
Text: That way.

Name: Kamui
Text: Oh, it's that way... Guess my Navi was right, after all. Good luck on your mission too, friend!

Name: Roland
Text: Don't mention it.

Name: Roland
Text: Well, well. They do have some interesting people on their side, don't they?

Name: Lucia
Text: This is where the distress signal originated.

Name: Lee
Text: High Construct casualties, but low levels of Punishing Virus...

Name: Liv
Text: Thankfully, they all recalled their consciousnesses. Their bodies weren't further infected as well.

Name: Lucia
Text: We should do some preliminary recovery, and find out what happened while we're at it.

Name: Lee
Text: They are covered in gunshot wounds.

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever did this is packing some serious heat. Be on your guard.

Name: Lee
Text: Look!

Name: Heavy Terrapod
Text: Visitor Identification: Thug. Commence program, "Civil Control".

Name: Liv
Text: It's... one of the Estate Terrapods. Someone must have reactivated it.

Name: Lee
Text: How many guns did they cram in this thing? Post-Pandemic Age tech really could use some subtlety...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, request backup from nearby team.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay!

Name: Kamui
Text: Leave these to me!

Name: Kamui
Text: Easy!

Name: Liv
Text: Wow, he must be a Tank Construct... That onslaught didn't leave a scratch on him.

Name: Kamui
Text: (Chuckles)

Name: Lee
Text: The Estate structures are falling apart, but their control systems seem pretty much intact.

Name: Lee
Text: The Estate control systems can be accessed via that Terminal. If we can hack the defense codes, we can shut the systems down.

Name: Kamui
Text: Is that a bionic animal? Cooool!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wow! It's moving!

Name: Lee
Text: You—

Name: Lee
Text: He's activated the entire museum security system! And it's at the highest alert! That idiot...

Name: Kamui
Text: These exhibits... look super shady...

Name: Kamui
Text: But I won't touch them again, I swear!

Name: Lee
Text: Locked... Tch, of course.

Name: Liv
Text: Enemies behind us are closing in!

Name: Lee
Text: No good way around this. Let's deal with them first.
That's far enough. Please leave this place, while you still can.

Name: Liv
Text: Who... said that?

Name: Liv
Text: The... the exhibits are being activated!

Name: Lee
Text: Turn on EM Camo, quickly.

Name: Lee
Text: The Beamers ahead are hidden behind a force field. Our attacks will bounce right off.

Name: Lee
Text: We'll have to observe their attacks and time our exit carefully. Remember, any hits will disable our EM Camo.

Name: Lee
Text: Door locks disabled. Let's keep going.

Name: Lucia
Text: Some sort of barrier is blocking access to the courtyard...

Name: Liv
Text: There's a high Punishing Virus response... behind the force field.

Name: Lee
Text: It must be some kind of lair.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: It is intended to protect you... This is your last chance...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Once you pass through this barrier, there's no turning back.

Name: Lee
Text: Liv, insert your Levi-Gun core into the Terminal. It will short the force field.

Name: Liv
Text: On it.

Name: Liv
Text: The force field has been overloaded. We can continue on our way!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go.

Name: Lucia
Text: The fighting there is done. We don't have to rush. Let's clear out the Corrupted nearby first.

Name: Lucia
Text: Phew—mission accomplished.

Name: Lee
Text: Very thorough. Thank you, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Those Constructs... look a bit abnormal...

Name: Lucia
Text: Their limbs and Inver-Devices are all destroyed, but they've still got vital signs.

Name: Construct
Text: Stay...

Name: Lucia
Text: What happened to you? What are you trying to say?

Name: Construct
Text: Stay... back...

Name: Lucia
Text: Someone installed Motion Bombs inside them!

Name: Kamui
Text: That's so... messed... up...

Name: Lee
Text: Disarming these bombs isn't possible right now... We can only give them a bit of distance...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: That's what happens when you oppose the Ascendants—I do not wish to see it happen anymore.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: But it's too late now. Don't say I didn't warn you.

Name: Roland
Text: Loyal old Android. He has defended the Estate Museum for a very long time.

Name: Roland
Text: It would have ended quite differently if he had just succumbed to the power of Ascnet.

Name: Roland
Text: But, such is the fate of the weak.

Name: Roland
Text: Go. Complete your final task.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Thank you for releasing me...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I... will not allow... them... to defile Mr. Copperfield's legacy...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Initiating... central nervous system... self-destruct sequence...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Mr. Copperfield... In the end, I failed you. I couldn't protect the Estate...

Name: Roland
Text: Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: What?

Name: Roland
Text: Now show me what you can do.

Name: Roland
Text: I don't mind if the others join in, but in the end... only one of you will remain.

Name: Lucia
Text: One of... us?

Name: Roland
Text: Which one will it be?

Name: Roland
Text: You're weak... just like she said.

Name: Lucia
Text: What... are you saying?

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey punk—

Name: Kamui
Text: Over here!

Name: Roland
Text: What?!

Name: Lee
Text: You found the monitors?

Name: Kamui
Text: Yeah... but any equipment exposed to the elements could have been infected.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hope they still work. Let me try!

Name: Kamui
Text: They seem to be working. It must be my lucky day.

Name: Kamui
Text: We should bring them in for analysis.

Name: Liv
Text: We need to find somewhere quiet. The battlefield isn't the place for computational work.

Name: Kamui
Text: The tremors feel different here. I've got a bad feeling about this.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'll place some EMP bombs in strategic positions.

Name: Kamui
Text: Cover me, Lee. Don't hold back.

Name: Lee
Text: You got me...

Name: Kamui
Text: Take cover! Baby's gonna blow!

Name: Lee
Text: Those things don't affect us... What were you thinking?

Name: Lee
Text: The place is strewn with Corrupted parts...

Name: Lee
Text: Status?

Name: Liv
Text: It's at 20% power. If we're doing something, now would be the time...

Name: Zack
Text: Emma...

Name: Liv
Text: It's very hot here. Commandant... are you okay?

Name: Lucia
Text: In and out. Find a supply point for Commandant.

Name: Kamui
Text: Target sighted! Wow... it looks a lot bigger in real life. What's it called again?

Name: Lee
Text: Vassago, a kind of bionic Sand Worm. It moves through the sand and ambushes its prey.

Name: Lucia
Text: Remain vigilant. We don't have much experience in this kind of environment.

Name: Lucia
Text: Did you feel that, Lee?

Name: Lee
Text: Yes. EM Camo. The enemy's using military-grade tech.

Name: Lucia
Text: They could attack from any direction. Watch your back.

Name: Liv
Text: Identifying target code... BPO-29, status... Deserter?
Lucia? It's you...
Looks like... you aren't with the cleaners.

Name: Lucia
Text: Kamui, don't rush in!

Name: Kamui
Text: Worry not! This is the part I'm actually good at!

Name: Lucia
Text: I don't like that... I'm getting used to his style somehow...

Name: Lucia
Text: Status update?

Name: Kamui
Text: ...And they didn't even clear out the Corrupted here before telling us to set up a supply point?

Name: Kamui
Text: Whatever. More fun for me!

Name: Lucia
Text: This place will be easy to defend.

Name: Lee
Text: Why do we have to do all the fighting? Are they afraid or something?

Name: Lucia
Text: We've got no choice. They're in charge of transport.

Name: Kamui
Text: I can't believe he laid so many traps.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I just don't have that many folks I can spare, that's all.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'll get you!

Name: Lucia
Text: Kamui is fighting his own battle. Lee, I need you to take care of fire support. Hurry!

Name: Lucia
Text: Forget about those Corrupted! We've got to get Liv back!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wo-ah! There it is! The Vassa-thingamajig... I can never remember what it's called...

Name: Kamui
Text: Is it following us? What does it want?

Name: Kamui
Text: We don't have time to play with you! Lie down like a good boy! HAIYA!!!

Name: Lee
Text: Weird. It looked like it was going for Commandant...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant... I...

Name: Lucia
Text: No. I'm sure it'll be fine.

Name: Kamui
Text: Keep your eye on Lucia, Commandant.

Name: Kamui
Text: While I go shove a sock in Watanabe's mouth.

Name: Liv
Text: The Purifying Force... Constructs that kill Constructs…

Name: Lee
Text: Leave that for later. Let's mop up these wandering enemies first then take a rest.

Name: Watanabe
Text: If you don't believe me, go look at those tombstones.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Manhami, Analyzer, Katana specialist, Lazy dullard, November.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Kiryu, Attacker, Switch Axe specialist, Cuddle dragon, November.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Yayoi, Analyzer, Life Support specialist, Flowers for tomorrow, November.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Fresh meat for the grinder... You'll help fight, yes?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Surrender! I'm not going to kill any Constructs.

Name: Liv
Text: I refuse!

Name: Kamui
Text: Watanabe can take care of Liv for us.

Name: Kamui
Text: Maybe we should put some distance between us and the enemy, Commandant.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'll stop 'em. You get Lee out of here, Commandant!

Name: Lee
Text: We need to move fast. I just hope Kamui's map is accurate...

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't make too much noise. We don't want to alert the Forsaken. They're still holding Liv...

Name: Lucia
Text: This facility is probably rigged. Stay sharp...

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee? Kamui?!

Name: Lucia
Text: What is it?

Name: Lucia
Text: Gone...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Visual system errors? Disorder in the M.I.N.D.?

Name: Lucia
Text: The Corrupted signals have recovered. We'll have to fight... It won't hurt them, will it?

Name: Lee
Text: The next batch of projectors is in position.

Name: Lee
Text: Follow my mark.

Name: Lee
Text: Graviton detector imaging has commenced. The image is fuzzy, but will suffice.

Name: Lee
Text: But these Corrupted aren't projections.

Name: Lucia
Text: How did the Forsaken get through here with no Graviton Detectors?

Name: Lee
Text: I guess they know this place... Why else would they bring Liv here straight?

Name: Lee
Text: If we want the EMP to affect the maximum number of projectors, we need to find the best spot.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's Corrupted everywhere. I'll send a signal when the coast is clear.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Corrupted attacks are slowing...

Name: Lucia
Text: NOW!!!

Name: Lee
Text: Okay.

Name: Lucia
Text: You said to not let Kamui out of our sights. Is there something?

Name: Lee
Text: Well, seeing how we're on the dedicated Gray Raven channel...

Name: Lee
Text: I was just checking Kamui's Inver-Device...

Name: Lee
Text: It was running on high-load mode. And there are logs of him trying to turn off his GPS and Comms systems.

Name: Lucia
Text: Turning off his own...

Name: Lee
Text: He might have his own plans... but I think we definitely need to check in with him more.

Name: Lee
Text: Corrupted are shielding the projectors...

Name: Lee
Text: The one in the middle seems different. I think it must hold the secret to this place.

Name: Kamui
Text: Okay, here goes!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commencing capture of next target.

Name: Lee
Text: Kamui, don't damage its memory shell.

Name: Kamui
Text: Haha, as long as I don't hit him directly, he'll be fine...

Name: Lucia
Text: Done—over to you, Lee.

Name: Nanami
Text: Show Nanami the M.I.N.D. or you'll regret it—

Name: Nanami
Text: WA-POW!

Name: Lucia
Text: Such strength! Not even a scratch?!

Name: Nanami
Text: Pffft! This is boring!

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami's had enough.

Name: Kamui
Text: This place looks quite oriental. It takes me back...

Name: Lee
Text: We're in Liv's M.I.N.D. She's already showing signs of the Punishing Virus.

Name: Lee
Text: Tch. That Watanabe... He best get ready for a beating after this...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv!

Name: Lee
Text: Don't hold back, Lucia! We might not get another chance!

Name: Lucia
Text: (Deep breaths) Very well...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv...

Name: Watanabe
Text: We're on top of Underground Refugee City 019. During the Post-Pandemic Age it was home to half a million refugees.

Name: Watanabe
Text: That's about one-third of Babylonia's current population. Of course, it all ended in tragedy.

Name: Liv
Text: Corpses are piled high at the exits... indicating the severity of the final crisis that erupted inside...

Name: Lee
Text: Our objective is the Ascendants. Let the archeologists take care of history.

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait. Something's climbing up under the elevator!

Name: Kamui
Text: Finally, some movement.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The door's open.

Name: Lucia
Text: We need to cross the walkway to keep moving down.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hurry. We don't want to get caught out on a bridge.

Name: Kamui
Text: Haha! Lucia knows her away around a battlefield!

Name: Liv
Text: Everyone, I've picked up... a familiar signal.

Name: Nanami
Text: Executing purification mission, target: Forsaken...

Name: Liv
Text: That Corrupted used to be... a giant omni-directional mobility firefighting device...

Name: Kamui
Text: So what you're saying is... it knows hydro-pump!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey. Why have we got fewer Corrupted than the Forsaken? You been slacking off or something?

Name: Lee
Text: It's not a competition...

Name: Lee
Text: Snap out of it, Nanami. You helping or not?

Name: Nanami
Text: I'm waiting!

Name: Lee
Text: For what?

Name: Nanami
Text: The one behind you!

Name: Lucia
Text: We can deal with Kamui later. Our top priority is clearing the path ahead.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, hold your position at the center of the group until we pass.

Name: Lee
Text: That Strike Hawk deserted...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Then he's bound to come to "her" attention...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I know full well how that's like.

Name: Lee
Text: You seem pretty composed being a target...

Name: Lucia
Text: How come...

Name: Lee
Text: When there's still so many Corrupted... covert action is the only option.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The girl was right. The isolation doors are still working.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, close the door. I'll clear things up with Kamui... once the mission is complete.

Name: Lucia
Text: Door closed! Everyone, go and help Nanami.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll start laying out the detonators.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Gray Raven, you are responsible for clearing the Corrupted in this vicinity.

Name: Watanabe
Text: No! The road collapsed...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Kid, you go back first. Destroying the source of Corrupted is my task.

Name: Liv
Text: That voice... sounds so cold...

Name: Lee
Text: Capable of rational thought at such high virus levels... I wonder, are we looking at another Ascendant "masterpiece"?

Name: Lucia
Text: Her voice... sounds familiar... ugh...

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia, are you okay? Everyone... proceed with caution!

Name: Lucia
Text: Up in the sky a... friendly transporter... but we didn't call for backup.

Name: Lee
Text: If they're coming uninvited... then they must be the Purifying Force.

Name: Liv
Text: I've got Kamui's signal. He's not far!

Name: Lucia
Text: Kamui...

Name: Lucia
Text: Hurry! We cannot afford to waste time!

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, Bianca, Karenina. I can't let you go any further.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's okay. Let's settle this then.

Name: Corrupted
Text: I will not let you take them!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Everyone is precious to me!

Name: Lucia
Text: Rest in peace... Sister.

Name: Lucia
Text: Calm down, Luna!

Name: Luna
Text: I'm not listening to you!

Name: Liv
Text: Unidentified force on the radar!

Name: Watanabe
Text: So they're sending in Bianca's team...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ol' geezer, you know them?

Name: Watanabe
Text: You could say that. Fought with them before, even.

Name: Lee
Text: They must be quite formidable, then.

Name: Liv
Text: Even if they're the Purifying Force, I won't back down!

Name: Bianca
Text: Disobedience is a crime, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: No... I'm the leader!

Name: Karenina
Text: Bianca, you said I'll get to fight Lucia!

Name: Kamui
Text: Your enemy is here!

Name: Bianca
Text: Scavengers are always looking for rare metals among the ruins.

Name: Bianca
Text: So where are they all now?

Name: Bianca
Text: And what is this drill rig doing here?

Name: Lucia
Text: They're going to bring the whole place down! Stop them!

Name: Lee
Text: The path splits up. There's no time...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant can decide.

Name: Nanami
Text: So many Corrupted—but y'all can't stop Nanami!

Name: Nanami
Text: Commandant, Rohacchi is over there!

Name: Lee
Text: I've marked the optimal sites to place the Disruptor.

Name: Bianca
Text: No! There's no time. We need to get out of here before we're completely surrounded!

Name: Liv
Text: No, it's a signal transmitter!

Name: Bianca
Text: A trap... No doubt we have been exposed.

Name: Lucia
Text: Stay sharp... and hurry.

Name: Bianca
Text: Out of my way!

Name: Bianca
Text: Karenina... Don't be rash...

Name: Liv
Text: Is it because of Kamui...?

Name: Lee
Text: Shoot first and ask questions later.

Name: Lucia
Text: Find Commandant's Mind Beacon, before the M.I.N.D. overheats.

Name: Lucia
Text: Overheating in the M.I.N.D. is a manifestation of obsession in the Construct's memories...

Name: Lucia
Text: Eliminate Corrupted... Eliminate Punishing Virus...

Name: Lucia
Text: Sync complete... Auto-jumping to the position of next Mind Beacon.

Name: Lucia
Text: Mind Beacon sync complete... Is that... a frog plushie?

Name: Liv
Text: Hang in there, everyone!

Name: Liv
Text: Fire support incoming!

Name: Bianca
Text: Watanabe and I have Roland pinned down. Take down that huge Mech!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'm having a major déjà vu.

Name: Bianca
Text: Show me what you can do now.

Name: Lucia
Text: You're not getting away this time!

Name: Roland
Text: Empty words from an empty mind.

Name: Roland
Text: Only fools underestimate an Ascendant...

Name: Roland
Text: ...That was unexpected.

Name: Liv
Text: Supply Crate has been delivered to target location.

Name: Lucia
Text: Protect the Supply Crate. Destroy any Corrupted that come near.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Dawn frame demonstrates greatly enhanced powers in combat.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll do my best not to drag you into the firing line.

Name: Lucia
Text: Corrupted everywhere. Stay out of their scanner range.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Hehe, I'll grind you into paint!

Name: Roseblade
Text: Your wish is my command... Master.

Name: Roseblade
Text: I cannot... permit you... to continue.

Name: Liv
Text: ...It's not working. Lee's signal has completely vanished!

Name: Lucia
Text: Pursue the "Iron Maiden".

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't let her get away. If she does, we'll lose all contact with Lee.

Name: Liv
Text: Eliminate these Corrupted...

Name: Liv
Text: And find a way to limit Lee's attacks.

Name: Tifa
Text: How exciting, defeater of Roland! Hold nothing back!

Name: Lucia
Text: The Energy Pod is all red inside... There's no way to ascertain Kamui's current status.

Name: Lucia
Text: Our objective is to restrict Purifying Force mobility and protect Kamui.

Name: Lucia
Text: Avoid their vitals.

Name: Kamui
Text: I don't surrender to anyone! Not you or the Tenebrion!

Name: Kamui
Text: I'm already mentally prepared... I'll just have to defeat you!

Name: Camu
Text: Your help is here, huh...?

Name: Kamui
Text: Why... are you...?

Name: Lucia
Text: I said I'd help you.

Name: Camu
Text: Fools... It will make your M.I.N.D. overheat.

Name: Camu
Text: You'll be wide open to the Punishing Virus.

Name: Lucia
Text: Assuming you can beat us.

Name: Ayla
Text: I can sense Selena's voice!

Name: Ayla
Text: It's clear, and close...

Name: Ayla
Text: We're going to meet again, Selena...

Name: Ayla
Text: Just hang on for one more moment...

Name: Ayla
Text: Keep... keep singing...

Name: Ayla
Text: Those were...

Name: Ayla
Text: That tremor...

Name: Ayla
Text: The space station is... breaking up?

Name: Ayla
Text: At this rate, not only Selena but also other troops...

Name: Ayla
Text: I have to come up with a solution...

Name: Ayla
Text: I should be able to access the control system by that.

Name: Ayla
Text: It seems pretty old-style...

Name: System
Text: Electromagnetic lock control module back online, insufficient authority to modify...

Name: Ayla
Text: Although I can't modify it directly, it should be good enough for now.

Name: Ayla
Text: Okay, next...

Name: Ayla
Text: Selena should be nearby...

Name: Korolev
Text: Intruders detected... Intruders detected...

Name: Korolev
Text: You must buy a sightseeing ticket first... Please buy your ticket at the ticket booth...

Name: Korolev
Text: Otherwise, a special procedure will be initiated...

Name: Ayla
Text: ...This is?

Name: Ayla
Text: That's pretty...

Name: Ayla
Text: Do you know where is Selena?

Name: Korolev
Text: Initiating enforcement procedure—

Name: Ayla
Text: Seems I don't have a choice...

Name: Ayla
Text: I have no time for this. Bring it on!

Name: Korolev
Text: Higher threat level detected—

Name: Korolev
Text: Abandoned current mission—

Name: Korolev
Text: Go to the location—gravity room.

Name: Ayla
Text: Ah... Ran off...

Name: Ayla
Text: But I can search around at last...

Name: Ayla
Text: (Searches and digs around)

Name: Ayla
Text: There's some logbooks stored in the terminal. They should be useful...

Name: Ayla
Text: Hostile signals?

Name: Ayla
Text: All right, Selena, wait for me. I'm coming.

Name: Ayla
Text: The interference is too strong...

Name: Ayla
Text: After wiping out the enemies here, I have to find another terminal as a signal amplifier—

Name: Ayla
Text: In doing so, I can contact Gray Ravens...

Name: Ayla
Text: According to the topographic map, there should be a terminal ahead.

Name: Ayla
Text: Found it!

Name: Ayla
Text: But... that is not good.

Name: Ayla
Text: Those Heteromers are protecting the terminal. And there's a robot guard near it...

Name: Ayla
Text: I'd better not get close to those cubes...

Name: Ayla
Text: And that robot guard... seems to communicate with the terminal in certain ways...

Name: Ayla
Text: In short, I have to activate it!

Name: Ayla
Text: Activated the robot guard!

Name: Ayla
Text: Yeah, it works!

Name: Ayla
Text: It seems the Heteromers here could be easily deconstructed...

Name: Ayla
Text: Maybe they've lost too much energy because of Gray Raven.

Name: Ayla
Text: Let me see if the terminal still works.

Name: Ayla
Text: It is activated. Finally I can contact Gray Ravens.

Name: Luna
Text: Lucia, are they...

Name: Lucia
Text: Corrupted, a bit stronger than the ones you saw before.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, stay close.

Name: Luna
Text: Roger...

Name: Lucia
Text: Ha... Ha...

Name: Luna
Text: You've been fighting with them all this time...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, try to focus. There's still a...

Name: Luna
Text: But you're already...

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna!

Name: Lucia
Text: Just wait for me...

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't do... anything stupid...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll be right there... Just wait for me!

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna... I'm sorry...

Name: Mother
Text: You can't go out like that all covered in dust. What will the recruiter say?

Name: Mother
Text: Go put that dress on, sort yourself out in front of the mirror, then come back out.

Name: Liv
Text: Not here... Probably in the closet.

Name: Liv
Text: Such a pretty dress...

Name: Liv
Text: Can I really just wear it...?

Name: Nanami
Text: Must... fight... then... find Mommy and Jane...

Name: Nanami
Text: I did it... but I'm drained...

Name: Nanami
Text: The Corrupted are attacking humans!

Name: Nanami
Text: Wait, why do the Corrupted and humans... all look the same... to me?

Name: Nanami
Text: No... Nanami... Pull yourself together! Look closer...

Name: Nanami
Text: There are two Corrupted!

Name: Guard A
Text: She's coming this way! She's been Corrupted!

Name: Nanami
Text: No, you're...

Name: Guard B
Text: Aim!

Name: Nanami
Text: No... Nanami needs to... get out of here...

Name: Lee
Text: Let's fix this quickly and go home.

Name: Lee
Text: Murray's birthday is coming up. Before that, maybe I can...

Name: Lee
Text: I can send the whole message using 0s and 1s.

Name: Lee
Text: Binary operations, being and nothingness, black and white, order without chaos.

Name: Lee
Text: Prepare to meet your maker. It will be sequential and instantaneous.

Name: Lee
Text: ...The final chip. Murray, your brother I might... have to wish you Happy Birthday ahead of time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hope today's harvest is good.

Name: Karenina
Text: (Searches and digs around)

Name: Karenina
Text: Nothing at all... Ah! Those people, again!

Name: Karenina
Text: It says... Inver-Device... Beta version... I wonder what it's for...

Name: Karenina
Text: The thing inside looks real valuable though.

Name: Karenina
Text: There's an ID in the box... Huh? Why's it got grandpa's photo on it?

Name: Karenina
Text: Huh? Where's all that stuff I just found?

Name: Karenina
Text: Eek... It's getting late. I should head back...

Name: Karenina
Text: What's this? It looks like a remote control, for... this Robo Bug.

Name: Karenina
Text: It looks unstable, like it'd explode any minute... Let me try...

Name: Karenina
Text: Wow! It actually moved!

Name: Karenina
Text: That was a big explosion!

Name: Karenina
Text: I think it broke something... Hope no one was hurt...

Name: Watanabe
Text: The only person who can save you... is yourself. Got it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Where you see scrap metal, I see trophies!

Name: Abnormal Corrupted
Text: ...than... my... son...

Name: Girl
Text: ...Father...?

Name: Bianca
Text: I will not allow anyone to get hurt!

Name: Bianca
Text: I will protect you all, until the end!

Name: Soldier
Text: Where'd they all go...?

Name: Watanabe
Text: The snow looks strange.

Name: Bianca
Text: This is something a priest would wear...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Father Snow?

Name: Bianca
Text: No! The children!

Name: Kamui
Text: ...Who ARE you?
I'm the one who is going to save you.

Name: Kamui
Text: I... don't need saving.
That is not for you to decide.

Name: Nanami
Text: That's not surprising!

Name: Nanami
Text: Anyway, let's take a closer look...

Name: Nanami
Text: Hello! Can you hear me?

Name: Injured Construct
Text: Constructs from... Babylonia? They fooled you too, huh...? Watch out, behind you!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hold on while Nanami takes care of these guys. Be right back!

Name: Injured Construct
Text: Scavengers made this place... using the Corrupted. It's a Construct hunting ground...

Name: Injured Construct
Text: A girl hid me here and gave me this energy cell to keep me going...

Name: Nanami
Text: I knew it... Don't worry. I'll take it from here!

Name: Nanami
Text: So high Punishing levels! Did you come chasing after the traces of Construct remains, all the way from the surface?

Name: Nanami
Text: Hey! You there! It's not okay to destroy Nanami's favorite ruins and hurt Nanami's friends!

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: Good timing. The energy cell will power me up for a while. I can help you!

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: The hunting ground and the Scavengers... There's more to this than what meets the eye.

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: It was human Scavengers that attacked me... but the girl who saved me was a human Scavenger too...

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: Thanks to you guys I'll be able to make my report in person.

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: I'll tell them everything, about the assault on the Fortress... You were amazing by the way!

Name: Nanami
Text: Ohoho! Of course, Nanami IS amazing! Oh... Amy, are you okay?

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: The girl who saved me... Has she... passed out?

Name: Corrupted
Text: Power, POWER!!!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Is that... a Construct? Thank goodness!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: After we were shot down, the Corrupted rushed us. We can't hold out much longer!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You're here to help us, right?

Name: Corrupted
Text: Devour... Target Construct...

Name: Roland
Text: After these scum found Lucia... they were like hounds on a blood trail... And now they're even in my way...

Name: Roland
Text: Do you not know that this belongs to Miss Luna?

Name: Roland
Text: Stand back.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Sorry, we're on a top-priority escort mission. Only team members can approach the client.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Duty calls, friend. Move aside. We don't want any trouble.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: What are you doing? Aren't you here to help us?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Wait... This one's full of Punishing Virus! We've got contact!!!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Thanks for the rescue!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You're an old model, but you're pretty good. Which team are you from?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: When this is done, I can finally go back to Babylonia, outta this hell hole.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: I know you saved us, but please don't interfere with our mission.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Lucia is a hero to us. We must escort her back to Babylonia.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We don't know what the purpose of our mission is, but please cooperate. Don't approach Lucia.

Name: Roland
Text: I smell a rat.

Name: Roland
Text: Keep running, it'll make it more interesting, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: I can't win in my current state... I've got to... get away...

Name: Lucia
Text: But... where can I go?

Name: Roland
Text: There you are.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm getting tired. Come back with me, there's a good girl. Miss Luna's waiting.

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't try to fool me!

Name: Roland
Text: Where are you going?

Name: Lucia
Text: Get away from me, you... Corrupted!

Name: Roland
Text: Hah hah... As expected of Miss Luna's...

Name: Roland
Text: So... you want to do it the hard way...

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that the sound of battle? I wonder what's going on.

Name: Lucia
Text: If I can just get through these Corrupted... I'll be able to get away...

Name: Lucia
Text: Finally... Am I free?

Name: Lucia
Text: But where should I go next...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Lu...na...
Tch, she's completely ignoring my attacks.
She seems to be drawn to Lucia, but Lucia, you...

Name: The Other Lucia
Text: I'm fine... Keep Commandant safe...

Name: Lucia
Text: Surely you feel it too... Lucia?

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that all you have, Lucia...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Enough of this nonsense!

Name: Human Soldier
Text: Wo-ah!

Name: Watanabe
Text: The Corrupted made it this far?!

Name: Watanabe
Text: We'll have to fight our way out!

Name: Cyril
Text: Pretty good, kid.

Name: Watanabe
Text: All Constructs can fight. Only some know how to fly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Get on! Cyril, you go first!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll clear the runway!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Prepare for liftoff!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Cyril... It's not that I don't trust you...

Name: Watanabe
Text: But let's turn on the force field, just in case.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's see... should be the start button first...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Re-enter command, command code:\nContra\nConfirm again after entering the code.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Enemy in range. Enter combat mode!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Tsk! No time to get the force field up!

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: Captain! We got you!

Name: Cyril
Text: It's...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Backup!!

Name: Cyril
Text: Let's teach them some respect!

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: You'll never catch Captain Cyril!

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: Lay down suppressive fire!!!

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: We've been hit!

Name: Cyril
Text: Enough. Pull out.

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: Captain Cyril.

Name: Cyril
Text: You're no match for him.

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: Sorry, Captain...

Name: Cyril
Text: Watanabe, this is mine, as well as Bruce's fight against you!

Name: Cyril
Text: (Coughs) Guess us meat bags... can't keep up with Constructs in piloting...

Name: Cyril
Text: Too bad I already got the Stealth mode permissions for this unit!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: An island after the storm, a forlorn Prince, a song heard from afar.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Welcome to my tale—the tale of Prince Ferdinand.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Ah, what a desolate place this is? I, the proudest son of the King of Naples, find myself upon this foreign field!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: That damned and sudden tempest, frightening to behold, overturned a mighty galleon thirty decks in height!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Uprooting the stout mast and shredding a hundred sturdy sails,

Name: Ferdinand
Text: I don't even know if my brilliant father, the blessed King of Naples, is alive or dead!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: What sin has been committed for beloved father and son to be so cruelly torn apart?

Name: Servant
Text: Your Majesty, I am sure your father will be safe.

Name: Servant
Text: Majesty, I fear the King has been shipwrecked on another island just as we have.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Then what are we waiting for? Naples cannot last one day without its King, nor can I last one day without my beloved father!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Pass me my sword! No treacherous wood nor wild beast can stand in my way!

Name: Servant & Servant
Text: Yes, Your Majesty. We will lay down our lives for you!

Name: Caliban
Text: Swine! This is a province of gods and fairies, not a place for worthless bags of skin like you!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: ...Am I imagining things? Don't tell me, my ears were drowned by the sea?

Name: Servant
Text: Majesty! This creature called you a swine!

Name: Servant
Text: Majesty! This creature called you a worthless bag of skin!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Ingrates! Do I not treat you with kindness every day? How dare you insult me and blame it on someone else!

Name: Servant & Servant
Text: Mercy, Majesty!

Name: Caliban
Text: Look at these ugly mortals, covered in fair skin, but filled with dirty secrets!

Name: Caliban
Text: Alas... Only the magician's daughter can be said to be truly beautiful!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Shallow monster! Not even fair maids are safe from your predation!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Hahahaha, the battle has only served to stir my blood! Now to rid the world of another evil!

Name: Caliban
Text: ROOARR—!!! I shall smash you into pulp, pipsqueak!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Ha, ha... Not bad for a weak monster.

Name: Caliban
Text: Look at the pipsqueak, waving his toothpick around like he's a real Knight.

Name: Servant & Servant
Text: Yes, Your Majesty! You can do it!
Stop!

Name: Caliban
Text: Hark, that voice, sweet as the blood of my quarry. A beautiful angel approaches!

Name: Miranda
Text: A fragrant island, a beautiful princess, guest of the storm.

Name: Miranda
Text: Welcome to my tale—the tale of Princess Miranda.

Name: Miranda
Text: The tempest has pass'd, the storm clouds have parted, sunshine spills upon the golden earth.

Name: Miranda
Text: Blessed Goddess! Your faithful servants sing your praises!

Name: Miranda
Text: Wait! Is that sound of fairies conversing upon the wind?

Name: Miranda
Text: Listen. The sounds of battle over yonder.

Name: Miranda
Text: Is that the voice Caliban I can hear! Oh no! I must go and see!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Ha, ha... Not bad for a weak monster.

Name: Caliban
Text: Look at the pipsqueak, waving his toothpick around like he's a real Knight.

Name: Servant & Servant
Text: Yes, Your Majesty! You can do it!

Name: Miranda
Text: Stop!

Name: Miranda
Text: I called out without thinking... what shall I say next?

Name: Miranda
Text: Caliban is a powerful warrior! I never thought a mortal man would rival him!

Name: Miranda
Text: Oh! His countenance is so determined; his eyes are so deep!

Name: Miranda
Text: He is looking right at me! Be still my beating heart!

Name: Miranda
Text: It can't go on! Miranda, breathe deep! And speak in a steady voice—

Name: Miranda
Text: Stop this pointless fighting!

Name: King Alonso
Text: Prospero? What's going on?

Name: Prospero
Text: You traitor! Show yourself before your honorable king.

Name: Antonio
Text: Such filthy rumor. Does it come out of a demon's mouth?

Name: Prospero
Text: You are guilty of defying your king. It has been evidenced and no one could screen you anymore.

Name: Antonio
Text: Since you already found it out, only death upon you can spare my punishment!

Name: Abastian
Text: Let's not waste our time on this ignorant fool.

Name: Trinculo
Text: We'll just have to make them unable to talk.

Name: Antonio
Text: Ah! Don't touch me. I'm just a piece of rotten flesh!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: I'm here to declare, in the name of the god's divinity and justice, that the rebel has been defeated!

Name: Miranda
Text: Ferdinand! I know you are the one who has filled the space in my heart!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Oh, Miranda, stay calm. We still have a long time for this.

Name: Caliban
Text: No! I... won't allow it! Miranda's heart belongs to me!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Pathetic monster, your wish is meaningless.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Miranda's heart already belongs to me. It is an unshakable truth.

Name: Miranda
Text: I can't hold myself together anymore...

Name: Miranda
Text: Caliban, I'm telling you I won't spend my life with you.

Name: Caliban
Text: Miranda... What a pitiful woman!

Name: Sister
Text: You want a warm hug? Here, fall asleep in my arms...

Name: Sister
Text: God's love offers salvation.

Name: Sister
Text: Seeker of Light.

Name: Sister
Text: Tests of faith are often full of thorns.

Name: Sister
Text: Keep on going.

Name: Sister
Text: God loves all beings, saves all beings, abandons all beings...

Name: Sister
Text: Lord, have you abandoned me?

Name: Sister
Text: I give to you everything. My heart. My soul. My life.

Name: Sister
Text: What is love?

Name: Sister
Text: We are on Blessed Ground.

Name: Sister
Text: God bless.

Name: Sister
Text: Is this what God wants from me?

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that a Musashi IX in the middle?

Name: Camu
Text: You may hurt me. But my people will avenge me!

Name: Camu
Text: STAY BACK!!! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH—

Name: Camu
Text: Let's fight!!!

Name: Camu
Text: Fourth line

Name: Lucia
Text: Press left to start, press right to view.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to start a 10-second blitz. For 10 seconds, any damage taken will send you to the last save point.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to view Trap frequency.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to stop viewing.

Name: Celica
Text: Attention Commandants, this mission is a Stronghold assault.

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy has already deployed defenses along the route, but we only have partial enemy intel.

Name: Celica
Text: Therefore, choose your line-up carefully.

Name: Celica
Text: We have arrived at the enemy stronghold. Powerful enemies await.

Name: Celica
Text: Contact! Enemies appeared!

Name: Celica
Text: Today we're clearing this crowded Corrupted zone.

Name: Celica
Text: There are all kinds of Corrupted here and they come in huge numbers too. It's gonna be rough.

Name: Celica
Text: They're about to attack!

Name: Celica
Text: Clear Requirement: Kill a total of 100 enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: All enemies have been killed. You did well today.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets within the designated time</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets. Give priority to marked Corrupted</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets within 60 seconds</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>You have left the designated combat area</color>. Please return to the battlefield.

Name: Celica
Text: Hey, Commandant. There's some good news and some bad news.

Name: Celica
Text: The good news is, someone sponsored us a bunch of Cogs. We were running out.

Name: Celica
Text: The bad news is, we aren't the only ones after them.

Name: Celica
Text: We have to get our hands on these resources asap.

Name: Celica
Text: The new materials arrived today, but the transport team got sloppy and lost some along the way.

Name: Celica
Text: Could you go and salvage the missing materials for us?

Name: Celica
Text: Keep in mind, this area is not secure. Do your best to avoid all enemy contact.

Name: Celica
Text: Collect 5 crates and then extract. No need to take unnecessary risks! Good luck.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 1/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 2/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 3/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 4/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 5/7. Target achieved.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 6/7. Target exceeded.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 7/7. All materials collected. Mission fully completed.

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy is systematically looting and destroying our materials!

Name: Celica
Text: Objective: Protect materials and destroy all enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: This stage is currently being used for internal testing and is not an official stage.

Name: Lee
Text: Gold dust falling from the sky... I was right. Some device is sending gold dust to high altitudes.

Name: Lucia
Text: Metallic dust is sometimes used to cause electrical interference. Those mechanoids seem unaffected by it though.

Name: Lee
Text: They must be the "Mechanoid Guards" Browning described.

Name: Lee
Text: Avoid or attack. I'm good with either. You decide, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: These guards aren't easy to deal with. I sure hope Liv is okay...

Name: Lucia
Text: I dug them up and compared their chassis numbers. They're Goldfinch units.

Name: Lucia
Text: Where I found them, there were three immobilized guards. One of them could be the "culprit".

Name: Lucia
Text: We must find the "culprit" and get to the bottom of it.

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe their remains will hold some clues.

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever made these markings... has got to be the same type of Construct...

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, turn him over... What's that on his back?

Name: Lee
Text: ...Yep. It's a Goldfinch Inducer.

Name: Browning
Text: It's well guarded for some place that's in the middle of nowhere...

Name: Browning
Text: Frontal assault is not our thing... Give them the slip, then pick off the weak.

Name: Browning
Text: An underground facility...

Name: Goldfinch Member
Text: Browning! Multiple contacts!

Name: Browning
Text: We aren't equipped for this.

Name: Browning
Text: Pull back to the bridge!

Name: Goldfinch Member
Text: Unknown force field detected. If we continue towards the bridge, we'll get shredded...

Name: Browning
Text: Cover me while I set up a terminal to lift the field!

Name: Browning
Text: There's one more, waiting in ambush... OPEN FIRE!!!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, this one's different. Normally I'd suggest pulling back...

Name: Lucia
Text: But we've got to stop it emitting that distress signal.

Name: Lucia
Text: They just keep coming! There's no time! Take it down, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee still hasn't found Liv... Sorry. I shouldn't have been distracted...

Name: Lucia
Text: The Construct models outside are no longer used in Babylonia.

Name: Lucia
Text: I've been observing closely. There's no guards beyond the hideout. Please stay here, Commandant...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm going to copy their combat logs. Maybe we can get some intel...

Name: Unknown Construct
Text: Gold... Gold...

Name: Unknown Construct
Text: The Queen gives us... hope.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Queen...?

Name: Lee
Text: So the Mechanoid Guards were using these secret tunnels for rapid deployment.

Name: Lee
Text: The tunnels are covered in tin, blocking electrical signals of any forces moving through them.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: Construct... are you a royal guard, or slave?

Name: Lee
Text: You sneak along behind me and never show yourself. I almost thought you were being shy.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: I've decided. You must be a slave.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: The Queen... needs me...

Name: Lee
Text: She has the ability to overpower me... so why is she running?

Name: Lee
Text: Fighting on constricted terrain eliminates the enemy's numerical advantage.

Name: Lee
Text: But it doesn't leave much space for evasion.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, Lee and I aren't in very good shape. For this battle, you'll need to access Construct operating systems.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lower performance could cause Dodge lag and other problems. I'd feel better if you had access.

Name: Lucia
Text: If you don't mind, Commandant...

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: My dream... is over...

Name: Browning
Text: I've got to reduce Construct energy consumption... to save energy...

Name: Liv
Text: Always stand behind me in battle. Please don't get in my line of fire, whatever you do.

Name: Liv
Text: Let me take care of the fighting. I'll keep you safe.

Name: Liv
Text: It's unbelievable how many guards are lurking under the sand!

Name: Liv
Text: Browning, you're in charge of the Excavator. I'll stop the guards.

Name: Liv
Text: Guards have been pushed back. Browning, is everything okay?

Name: Browning
Text: Don't come over here!

Name: Liv
Text: Huh? The combat system has security measures...?

Name: Liv
Text: Why didn't Browning mention it...?

Name: Liv
Text: Stay calm, Liv... I need to beat them to change the energy protocols.

Name: Liv
Text: ...How?!! There are no energy protocols! It's a dummy system!

Name: Watanabe
Text: So many guards... If you can't fix the defense systems, get over here! I'm in trouble!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll just grab one to examine.

Name: Watanabe
Text: So the siren has three alarms.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The first two alert the guards. The third one goes to a proxy terminal.

Name: Watanabe
Text: This thing is basically useless now.

Name: Bianca
Text: Why are they all kneeling here?

Name: Bianca
Text: ... Besides the battle damage, they're in pretty good shape.

Name: Bianca
Text: More guards... They just never end.

Name: Bianca
Text: Goldfinch, can your people still fight?

Name: Bianca
Text: If I win, you have to come clean with me.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Not gonna happen, because I'm not losing.

Name: Watanabe
Text: So many guards...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let bygones be bygones. I won't follow you anymore. We should go our separate ways.

Name: Watanabe
Text: If I'm not mistaken, these engines drive those artificial sandstorms around the Golden Vortex.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But it stands to reason there must be more engines to generate so many sand storms.

Name: Watanabe
Text: My people... probably aren't trapped here.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I've been spotted! Better deal with these guys first...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Did someone rob a bank? This place is crawling with guards.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Better rush over, just in case.

Name: Bianca
Text: I'm standing right in front of them and still nothing? Maybe these Mechanoids aren't guards after all.

Name: Bianca
Text: Looks like they've got some kind of golden ring marked on them... Hard to tell what it is.

Name: Bianca
Text: What's that sound...? It's been ringing for ages...

Name: Bianca
Text: Da-da-di-da, di-di-da, di, di, da-di. What could it mean?

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'm not gonna fight you, at least not now.

Name: Watanabe
Text: This place is crawling with guards. And I only just found my people.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Where is he?

Name: Bianca
Text: If I can flush him out, have his men draw the guards' attention, he's bound to make an appearance.

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: Ah! Run! Shhh! The Warden's coming!

Name: Bianca
Text: Got to make sure those guards don't hurt him.

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: Run! Run! He's coming! Run!

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: I'm so scared... Leader, save me...

Name: Bianca
Text: There you are.

Name: Watanabe
Text: ...You used my people?

Name: Kamui
Text: Roland's probably cowering inside. There's no gold dust floating around in here.

Name: Kamui
Text: Fancy being brought to your knees by a spec of gold dust.

Name: Roland
Text: You're... no match for me...

Name: Kamui
Text: Whatever. I know you're gonna call in reinforcements.

Name: Kamui
Text: It doesn't matter who you send, the gold dust has turned you all into jelly!

Name: Kamui
Text: Gold dust doesn't just weaken the enemy, it interferes with their ability to tell friend from foe...

Name: Roland
Text: ...I'll just have to kill you myself!

Name: Roland
Text: ...I didn't come here to fight meaningless battles.

Name: Roland
Text: Garbage! Aim at the enemy!

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Shh... I know you... You know our leader Watanabe, right?

Name: Bianca
Text: ...You're a Forsaken?

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Quiet... Don't let the Warden hear you... He's hiding among the hostages...

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Cough... cough... Beware the Warden...

Name: Hostage
Text: ...Finally, someone has come to save us.

Name: Bianca
Text: So... you must be the "Warden". If not for the Forsaken, you might have tricked me.

Name: Hostage
Text: You dare oppose the will of the Queen!?

Name: Bianca
Text: Can you stand, human?

Name: Hostage
Text: No... I can't...

Name: Hostage
Text: Help me... Take my hand...

Name: Bianca
Text: It's okay. I'll get you out...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Everyone okay?

Name: Bianca
Text: The guards have defeated some Forsaken.

Name: Watanabe
Text: They came here to help me...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Forsaken, stand up! The battle's not over!

Name: Bianca
Text: Keep going! The battle's not over!

Name: Watanabe
Text: There's a few more left... Let me repay that volley with interest!

Name: Roland
Text: Release antibodies... and send me more guards...

Name: Roland
Text: Nithart... might be the toughest... opponent I've ever faced...

Name: Roland
Text: Still... these guards... pose no threat to an Ascendant...

Name: Nithart
Text: You put up a good fight, but you might need more antibodies.

Name: Roland
Text: Antibodies... mean nothing... to an Ascendant...

Name: Nithart
Text: You made no attempt to surrender, that's good.

Name: Nithart
Text: Show me your full strength as an Ascendant.

Name: Karenina
Text: Leave her be for a while...

Name: Karenina
Text: I can defeat the enemies safely with her barrier.

Name: Nanami
Text: Hey! How was Nanami's performance?

Name: Karenina
Text: Enough! There is still some distance away from the main building. Come with me!

Name: Nanami
Text: Alright... And you're not even praising Nanami...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ding-Ding-Dong... Ding-Ding-Dong... What are you installing, Karenina?

Name: Karenina
Text: There are so many guards. Don't tell me you're still gonna barge in by yourself.

Name: Karenina
Text: It's time for me to do some improvisation.

Name: Karenina
Text: Introducing my "automatic cannon" device. With it and my firepower, the guards pose no threat to us.

Name: Nanami
Text: So many Corrupted! So exciting! Nanami loves it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Core parts for hacking can definitely be found from these waves of Corrupted.

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami is going to find it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Congratulations, Nanami... Core parts get!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm...? A reinforcement request?

Name: Roland
Text: All Corrupted... Come to my coordinates... Eliminate all your obstacles...

Name: Nanami
Text: Whoa! Amazing!

Name: Nanami
Text: Your reinforcements will be right there, Roland!

Name: Karenina
