Text: One transceiver terminal is not enough to avoid disruptions while rebuilding the channel.

Name: Karenina
Text: The guards are definitely gonna notice once the terminal is on... It's so damn heavy too...

Name: Karenina
Text: Where even is Nanami!

Name: Karenina
Text: Channel 1 restored in one go... Luck is on my side.

Name: Karenina
Text: Internet channel restored... for perhaps a few minutes...

Name: Karenina
Text: Whatever! I need to quickly upload the antibody's analysis report.

Name: Roland
Text: We can only do two of them... These guards are required for the remaining...

Name: Roland
Text: Quick! Nanami! Stuff the guards in!

Name: Roland
Text: Must have them all collapse... on the air outlets...

Name: Roland
Text: Then their mobility will be limited... after Nithart reconnects to them.

Name: Nanami
Text: Ah, Nanami has seen some of the defeated guards came alive. So they were "reconnected"!

Name: Roland
Text: That's right... Seems like only a few of them can be reconnected.

Name: Roland
Text: The influence of the antibodies weakened...

Name: Roland
Text: Nanami... Thank you! I owe you one.

Name: Nanami
Text: Naughty Roland! Hmph!

Name: Roland
Text: ...Partially utilizing the Punishing Virus is impracticable, huh. As expected.

Name: Nanami
Text: Naughty Roland, Nanami's gonna bring you home!

Name: Kamui
Text: A Construct kneeling before a guard... Is that supposed to be an insult towards us?

Name: Karenina
Text: Wait! The guard's cognition device contains the blueprint of the Golden Vortex.

Name: Karenina
Text: They were the initial builders of this spectacle in the desert.

Name: Kamui
Text: ...Can we just extract the blueprint directly? In this case, we'll know the exact route!

Name: Karenina
Text: We can't... There's an extract permission, and we only... have two chances...

Name: Karenina
Text: Also, some of the blueprints are fake...

Name: Kamui
Text: What if... we extract the fake one?

Name: Kamui
Text: Bingo! Incredible me!

Name: Karenina
Text: We were just lucky, you dimwit...

Name: Kamui
Text: That wimp has absorbed the gold dust, and that's why it became that strong...

Name: Kamui
Text: It's gonna be a tough battle...

Name: Kamui
Text: Not like it's going to stop me! Let's duke it out!

Name: Kamui
Text: If we defeat them all and collect some gold dust, we may be able to cut it down to size.

Name: Kamui
Text: Still, I need to build an equipment to spread the gold dust into the air...

Name: Kamui
Text: Man, I'm not made for this kinda work...

Name: Roland
Text: The opera of the Punishing Virus... begins...

Name: Roland
Text: All your security programs make no difference.

Name: Roland
Text: Be prepared for doom, Golden Vortex.

Name: Roland
Text: Still gonna resist...?

Name: Master-Control Program
Text: Power system crashed... Eliminating... eliminating errors...

Name: Kamui
Text: Have they noticed Nanami?

Name: Karenina
Text: Obviously! Cut the crap and come with me to protect Nanami!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hurry up! Connect the guard's system for me!

Name: Karenina
Text: Nanami is isolated and helpless, I have to get in and help her!

Name: Kamui
Text: Just put on the bio-booster arms found by Nanami! I can feel the tremendous power inside them!

Name: Kamui
Text: I should try them on the Queen's guards later!

Name: Kamui
Text: But first, I need to test the arms' strength...

Name: Karenina
Text: The only place defended by the Queen's royal guards within the whole Golden Vortex is the Queen's bedchamber.

Name: Kamui
Text: I hope their strength is worthy of their title!

Name: The Queen's Royal Guard
Text: How dare you trespass on the Queen's prohibited zone... Pay with your lives!

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah! Nanami is going to meet Commandant real soon!

Name: Karenina
Text: But what about the front door?

Name: Kamui
Text: Don't worry. I can pry it open with one hand!

Name: Nithart
Text: Don't let go of any of them! Destroy them all!

Name: Nithart
Text: Commandant! This is your last chance!

Name: Nithart
Text: If you abandon those Constructs now, I can spare your life!

Name: Nanami
Text: There's a traitor among Nithart's guards... Nanami has met it before. It owns the door key...

Name: Lucia
Text: Traitor? Nanami, you...?

Name: Karenina
Text: Nanami has once connected to Nithart's network for a short time. If she says there's a key, there must be one.

Name: Nanami
Text: It used to be a Construct. The hole in its security system allowed it to shortly get rid of Nithart's control...

Name: Lucia
Text: Scatter! Find the Construct guard! Find the traitor!

Name: Lee
Text: I've just hacked into it, but I couldn't find any keys...

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't give up! Bianca also found a Construct guard, let's go there now!

Name: Lee
Text: Successfully hacked... but still there's no key in it...

Name: Nithart
Text: Don't ever think about hiding that from me!

Name: Nithart
Text: Guards! Quick! Obliterate the traitor with the key!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Thank you for releasing me from Nithart's control...

Name: Karenina
Text: Too many guards here. No point wasting my energy with them...

Name: Karenina
Text: We can operate them to battle after transferring their control to my virtual control console...

Name: Karenina
Text: But I can only build one virtual control console with the materials I have...

Name: Karenina
Text: One virtual control console can only hijack one guard's control...

Name: Karenina
Text: Which one should we choose?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I see Nanami on the platform far from our right side...

Name: Lee
Text: She must have dropped into the wrong tunnel and eventually fell there.

Name: Lee
Text: She's not the type to keep quiet.

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out, Nithart's guards are coming at us through the other entrance.

Name: Lucia
Text: She won't let go of us easily. So get ready to fight!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, Nanami is fighting alone, please closely monitor her frame's condition...

Name: Nithart
Text: Look what I've got you...

Name: Nithart
Text: Exhibit again that conceit you've shown me before, or my guards will turn you into scrap.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Most cunning. Thankfully, I'm her opponent.

Name: Bianca
Text: I have to return to Commandant as quickly as possible.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's the last...

Name: Nithart
Text: Destroy her! This is an order from the Queen! Destroy her!

Name: Kamui
Text: The virus has damaged the security process of the energy system. Our hacking is going well so far!

Name: Kamui
Text: Implant the "anti-virus programs"...

Name: Kamui
Text: If we're able to send these anti-virus programs to the corrupted zone, the infection speed will be greatly slowed down...

Name: Kamui
Text: I've already defeated two Corrupted outside...

Name: Kamui
Text: Keep pushing! Don't lose to "yourself," Kamui!

Name: Kamui
Text: The corrupted zone is ahead...

Name: Kamui
Text: This should buy some time for the Gray Raven, right?

Name: Karenina
Text: Unable to open?! What does that mean! I managed to crack into it...

Name: Lee
Text: That's because your crack is one-way only. You can only open all security doors if you execute the crack.

Name: Lee
Text: But in that case, the guards can also get in and surround us.

Name: Lee
Text: So, apart from an "open door" function, we need a "close door" one as well. The two actions must be done at the same time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Easy-peasy! I can connect the two cracking devices to the same "repeater". Problem solved.

Name: Lee
Text: Well, repeating is the easy part. The difficult part is that the second cracking device has to connect the "closing" system.

Name: Lee
Text: As door opening and door closing are two separate systems, we can only crack it one by one.

Name: Lee
Text: Lucia and the others are defending against the guards outside. We have to crack the door closing system quickly.

Name: Lucia
Text: You need to be quick. As more and more guards are trying to break through the exterior wall, they will break through our defense soon...

Name: Karenina
Text: Right... But why did the crack fail? Definitely nothing to do with my devices.

Name: Lee
Text: Yes, Nithart crashed the system on purpose while we were cracking. That's why it failed.

Name: Lee
Text: I'll connect the door closing system to my virtual console. If she does that again, she'll be redirected to it.

Name: Karenina
Text: Operating the final crack... Security doors opened...

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Everyone, through the security door! Quick!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee...

Name: Lee
Text: Okay. Operating the final crack... Security doors closed...

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch your front and back, the guards are tightening the encirclement...

Name: Lucia
Text: We have to destroy them all to prevent them from attacking the rescue aircraft.

Name: Bianca
Text: The royal guards are very difficult to handle. If we don't want to be attacked from both sides, we'd better concentrate our firepower on one side first.

Name: Karenina
Text: Commandant, quick! Which side! I'm gonna blow them all to smithereens!

Name: Lucia
Text: Nithart... she turned off the external sensorium of her frame.

Name: Lee
Text: She and the royal guards have already fused into one. Even if we concentrate our firepower on her, we'll still be unable to interrupt the guards' attack.

Name: Karenina
Text: Just blow 'em all up!

Name: Nanami
Text: Can we attack now? Nanami wants to fight!

Name: Bianca
Text: The Golden Vortex will turn into an inferno soon. We'd better go now. We can't let Nithart be on our way...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, let's make a clean break with Nithart.

Name: Lee
Text: It's about time.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku?

Name: Lee
Text: We can't keep Commandant and Liv waiting.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukukuku!

Name: Lee
Text: Phew... Okay, that should be enough.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukukukukukukuuu...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Merry Christmas to you all as well.

Name: Elite Corrupted
Text: Urgh—Uuurgh!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh!

Name: Nanami
Text: Whoa, so many bad boys here. Nanami is a good girl who refuses to resort to brute force!

Name: Nanami
Text: Then I should cut more trees quietly without being noticed by them!

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah! Go!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm, it looks good, and is far from the Corrupted.

Name: Nanami
Text: Even if I emit some noises, they won't notice when they're cutting trees, right?

Name: Nanami
Text: Okay! Start!

Name: Nanami
Text: These guys... They're just cutting at nothing now, but still aren't stopping...

Name: Nanami
Text: It's getting boring. Nanami's bringing the Christmas tree back! Bye bye!

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30><color=#ff0000>1!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=50><color=#ff0000>2!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=50>3!</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=70><color=#ffff00>Go!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=80><color=#ff0000>Stop!</color></size>

Name: Karenina
Text: The door blocks our way.

Name: Karenina
Text: What a nuisance. Just bomb 'em with the bugs!

Name: Karenina
Text: Lucia came up with the plan anyway, so she should be the one who has to take care of the consequences.

Name: Karenina
Text: I'll ring the bell before those boomboxes arrive.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hold on, the bell is so rotten that even a single touch will ruin it!

Name: Karenina
Text: Well, I don't care. At least the firework can start on time.

Name: Kamui
Text: The Gray Raven folks are so cold. They're all celebrating Christmas together without inviting me!

Name: Kamui
Text: I even prepared some gifts for them! Since I'm not invited...

Name: Kamui
Text: Let me sneak in from the roof to surprise them...

Name: Kamui
Text: Hm? What are those Corrupted doing? Do they also celebrate Christmas?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kuku... Kuuu...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Uuuurgh—

Name: Kamui
Text: Kuroro? How did you become so tiny?

Name: Kamui
Text: Wow, you guys are picking on the weak!

Name: Kamui
Text: Don't be afraid! I'm coming to rescue you!

Name: Kamui
Text: Alright, all Corrupted were gone. Are you okay, buddy?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kuku—ku? Kuku, kuku!!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hm? No need to thank me! It was nothing, hahaha!

Name: Kamui
Text: This is—a Santa Claus costume. Are you going to give it to me as a thank-you gift?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku?

Name: Kamui
Text: Great! That's exactly what I want!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukuku?

Name: Kamui
Text: You should leave too, so that you don't get bullied by the Corrupted again, buddy!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku? Ku? Ku? Ku? Ku?

Name: Kamui
Text: Thanks! Merry Christmas! Bye—

Name: α
Text: So this is a shrine... Where people used to worship to their god during the Golden Age.

Name: α
Text: Do I really have to wear this...?

Name: α
Text: ...If Luna wants to see it, fine.

Name: α
Text: Gods never exist. Even if they do, they won't be able to save me.

Name: α
Text: But...if only...
Squeak—!

Name: α
Text: Tsk, how annoying!

Name: α
Text: If the so-called gods do exist...

Name: α
Text: Please make Luna safe.

Name: α
Text: Even if it's something that gods can't do, I will make it happen.

Name: α
Text: I must continue. Luna's waiting for me.

Name: α
Text: Almost there.

Name: α
Text: —I only need to get rid of this trash first.

Name: α
Text: I should be able to make it.

Name: α
Text: ...Wait for me. I will be there for you right on the first minute of the new year.

Name: Liv
Text: Phew... Finally, only two areas left to test.

Name: Liv
Text: It was all because Miss Ayla asked us to test the portability of the New Year coating...

Name: Liv
Text: But still...

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, I must stop thinking about random things. Gotta concentrate on the mission!

Name: Liv
Text: Miss Ayla is so good... Her battle is smooth as always.

Name: Liv
Text: I wish I can go to the shrine with my fellow Gray Raven members in this outfit...

Name: Liv
Text: Alright, one final mission left.

Name: Liv
Text: I'm out!

Name: Liv
Text: Oops, it's almost 12 o'clock...!

Name: Liv
Text: I'm not in a shrine, but still...

Name: Liv
Text: Dear God, I wish everybody of Gray Raven can always be together.

Name: Liv
Text: I wish Commandant can be safe and healthy...

Name: Liv
Text: Thank you, dear God.

Name: Liv
Text: Time to go back. They are waiting for me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that a Nozzle? I guess I'll... take a closer look.

Text: Unauthorized party is approaching this unit.

Name: Firefighter

Name: Firefighter

Name: Firefighter

Name: Firefighter

Name: Firefighter

Name: Firefighter

Name: Firefighter

Name: Firefighter

Name: Firefighter
Text: Burn them all.

Name: Firefighter

Name: Musashi IX

Name: Musashi IX

Name: Missionary

Text: God, are you gazing at me?

Name: New Affix Notice

Text: Agile: Greatly increases movement speed.

Name: New Affix Notice

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: ATK Boost: Greatly increases ATK.

Name: New Affix Notice

Text: ATK Reduction: Lowers its ATK.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Flame: Burns nearby targets and attacks have an extra chance to inflict Burn.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Freeze: Lowers closing targets' speed and attacks have a chance to slow or freeze the targets.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Shadow: Attacks cause Dark Elemental DMG, having a chance to stun the target.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Icicle: Unleashes an ice pile to track its target and deal damage on contact.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Stealth: Disappears for a brief time and moves away from the target after attacking.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Barrier: Creates a shield at the start of battle to block all damage until it is broken.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Shield: Periodically creates a small shield that lasts for 3s or disappears upon taking a specific amount of damage.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Lightning Mine: Attacks have a chance to attach a bomb to the target, exploding after a short time.

Name: Celica
Text: Signal Orb Drop: Acquires a random Signal Orb when attacking.

Name: Celica
Text: Explosive Bugs Infest: Explosive Bugs will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Lightning Formation: The lightning formation will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Flame Trail: The flame trail will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodge can stop all skills other than Signature Move. Use it to avoid damage.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodged successfully! Please complete your mission.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodge consumes the dodge gauge. Construct will overheat when the dodge gauge is exhausted.

Name: Celica
Text: Move and dodge to avoid consecutive enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Keep dodging until you are overheated.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct is unable to dodge for 2s when overheated.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct will enter Matrix under special conditions.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> the moment before you are hit to enter Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: All enemies are slowed down in Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Now please complete the mission.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct skills are enhanced in Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Trigger EX Dodge.

Name: Celica
Text: A glowing Signal Orb means it is enhanced.

Name: Celica
Text: When you ping any glowing Signal Orbs, the skill will have the same damage and effect as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Take advantage of having multiple Constructs to dodge enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Entering Matrix has a 10s cooldown for each Construct.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, the dodge gauge will still be restored.

Name: Celica
Text: When a Construct overheats, you can switch to another one.

Name: Celica
Text: When you switch to a new Construct, the dodge gauge will not be affected by the previous Construct.

Name: Celica
Text: Matrix cooldown is not shared among the Constructs.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, you can continue to attack or catch your breath.

Name: Celica
Text: You can switch Constructs now.

Name: Celica
Text: Newly switched Construct has maximum dodge gauge and is able to enter Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attack is the primary means of attack for Constructs.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attack will give Constructs a random Signal Orb. Tap to ping it to unleash a corresponding skill.

Name: Celica
Text: Become familiar with the skills and learn how to chain them to fight effectively.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, please trigger the Blue 3-Ping Skill.

Name: Celica
Text: After triggering a 3-Ping, tap to trigger a QTE Skill of the corresponding color.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct has various means of attack and skills to increase damage

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct has certain crowd control skills to help in attacking.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct can enhance their Basic Attack or skill effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Constructs also have powerful damage skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Support-type Construct can repair other Constructs, enhancing your team's durability.

Name: Celica
Text: Some skills can heal damaged allies and yourself.

Name: Celica
Text: Support-type Construct has crowd control skills to help you get the upper hand in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct can attract enemy attacks and soak up damage.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct will have DEF boost or survival skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct has crowd control skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct can soak up damage, as well as use powerful AOE skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct has strong Piercing Armor abilities. Enemies take increased damage under Broken Armor state.

Name: Celica
Text: Please 3-Ping the Blue Orbs first.

Name: Celica
Text: Elite enemy has Super Armor. It cannot be interrupted when Super Armor exists.

Name: Celica
Text: Please 3-Ping the Yellow Orbs first.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct's QTE deals high damage to enemy Super Armor value, eventually inflicting <color=#ffda58>Broken Armor</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Every dodge consumes the dodge gauge, which recovers slowly. You can dodge once in about 3s.

Name: Celica
Text: Consecutively dodging until the dodge gauge is exhausted will result in overheating. Becoming unable to dodge in the next 3s.

Name: Celica
Text: [Dodge] the moment before you are hit to enter [Matrix], in which all enemies are slowed down.

Name: Celica
Text: When the Signal Orb bar is glowing, it means pinging any orbs will have the same effect as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Entering Matrix through dodging has a 12s cooldown. You cannot enter Matrix continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: Use [Matrix 3-Ping] to trigger [Lotus Dual Blade] more quickly.

Name: Celica
Text: [Matrix Cooldown] is not shared among the Constructs. Switch Constructs to trap enemies in Matrix continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to [Nanami]

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to [Lucia]

Name: Celica
Text: Nanami's QTE Skill can destroy enemy's armor, inflicting the <color=#ffda58>Broken Armor</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Enemies take increased damage under Broken Armor state.

Name: Celica
Text: There are some tips for pinging the orbs in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: When there are 4 Signal Orbs of the same color, tap the <color=#ffda58>leftmost one</color> to ping only 1 orb and keep the other 3 orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, you can apply this 1+3 pinging order to instantly trigger a 3-Ping effect twice.

Name: Celica
Text: Support QTE can restore HP or grant buffs.

Name: Celica
Text: When facing an enemy with heavy armor, use Tank-type Construct to enhance the Piercing Armor effect.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's get through here first... I'll explain to you later.

Name: Liv
Text: I can do it. I'll just be careful to not come into contact with these things.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We need your ability to access the M.I.N.D. and enter the central consciousness container.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Defeat those pseudo-consciousnesses and save them all.

Name: Liv
Text: Understood...

Name: Liv
Text: Watanabe? What's... going on?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Your consciousness... has been replaced and trapped in the fake M.I.N.D.? Darn it! Liv, hold on!

Name: Liv
Text: That is... me?

Name: Watanabe
Text: If you're attacked here, your consciousness permanently deviates.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We're creating an exit for you...

Name: Watanabe
Text: OK, use this trap to defeat her and you can get out of there.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Liv, what's the situation?

Name: Liv
Text: Seems to have gotten rid of her...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Phew... That's great.

Name: Liv
Text: Don't worry, Watanabe... It's not a big deal.

Name: Liv
Text: That's ... me? Such beautiful clothes...

Name: Watanabe
Text: That thing is not done yet...?!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I've hacked the system firewall. Liv, get out of there quick.

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, I couldn't save all of you.

Name: Lucia
Text: I've never seen a machine with such special consciousness...

Name: Lee
Text: Humans have left the Earth too long. We're no longer familiar with what has happened in this world.

Name: Lee
Text: All we can do is keep striving forward on our own path.

Name: Lucia
Text: Roger...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, we'll need you to access its control system to ensure it will not attack us when we reboot it.

Name: Liv
Text: Ok, leave it to me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, we're going to collect its scattered Memory Chips. We should be able to access more clues after a reboot.

Name: Old Artist
Text: Anthony, thank you for being my hands to help me complete my artwork... I have no more regrets.

Name: Old Artist
Text: My life is about to end. I don't need to paint anymore.

Name: Anthony
Text: No more... painting...

Name: Anthony
Text: Then... am I also... useless?

Name: Old Artist
Text: No, your journey has just begun.

Name: Old Artist
Text: I was controlling you to make my own works, but now, you can create your own by your thoughts.

Name: Anthony
Text: My... thoughts...

Name: Anthony
Text: Then... do you... recognize my... works?

Name: Old Artist
Text: To be honest, I don't really understand your works.

Name: Anthony
Text: Because... I am a... machine?

Name: Old Artist
Text: Could be, or could not. In any case, I hope you can keep it up.

Name: Old Artist
Text: You were so happy when making them. There must be someone who can understand you and share your joy in the future.

Name: Old Artist
Text: If you do find someone like that, you must not let them down...

Name: Old Artist
Text: Alright, I need to rest now.

Name: Buyer
Text: Darn it! I was planning on taking a gamble on this "Robot Artist" gimmick.

Name: Buyer
Text: Thanks to the Punishing Virus, everyone is afraid of robots now!

Name: Buyer
Text: Now those paintings are worth nothing! All turned into waste paper!

Name: Buyer
Text: You're worth nothing more than being a tool... I should sell you to other painters who need an assistant.

Name: Buyer
Text: Realizing a human artist's will. That's all you are.

Name: Lucia
Text: The chip is assembled.

Name: Lee
Text: We can reboot it now.

Name: Liv
Text: Um, preparing to access and reproduce Nozzle's memories.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: A world without humans... Free world... Free art...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Hehe... hehe...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Why... have to fight...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: There... must be a solution... where battle... is not necessary...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No one understands me... No one... appreciates... my work...

Name: Liv
Text: The memory is damaged...

Name: Liv
Text: I think I'll have to sync the memory up manually.

Name: Lucia
Text: Here's the first breakpoint. Liv, you can start the rebooting process.

Name: Liv
Text: Will do. Just a reminder the reboot will produce memory illusions.

Name: Liv
Text: Ready to reboot.

Name: Lee
Text: We'll take care of the illusions.

Name: Lee
Text: This is the last breakpoint. Let's get it over and done with.

Name: Lucia
Text: On it.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll do my best.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: It's Corrupted! They are forming an organization!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We must stop them!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: What... are... you... doing...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No... You must not... destroy the Sagemachina's will... Do not... damage... my work...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Leader... you awakened us...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Graffiti... is art... art...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The number of Corrupted keeps growing!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Attack!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Humans... cannot... understand...

Name: Liv
Text: Looks like here's another piece of damaged memory.

Name: Lucia
Text: In order to find more clues, a reboot is necessary.

Name: Lee
Text: Here's the breakpoint.

Name: Lucia
Text: Alright, start the reboot.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, get ready.

Name: Lee
Text: Got it. Same as always.

Name: Liv
Text: Replaying the memory now.

Name: Tifa
Text: Why aren't you stopping them?!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Because... they were... just running...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: They didn't... interfere... with my... creation... Hehe...

Name: Tifa
Text: What a foolish machine...

Name: Tifa
Text: But your powers are special. I may consider taking you in. You can become an Ascendant like me.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: I cannot... follow you... Hehe...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Only the Sagemachina... can... lead us... to a future of our own...

Name: Tifa
Text: Fool, the future of the world belongs to the Ascension-Network... This is just as expected of a machine.

Name: Tifa
Text: If you are not joining me, then die.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: You... are... as superficial... as those humans...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: So... tired...

Name: Tifa
Text: What an insignificant prey.

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Protect... the leader!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: It's...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Leader... run...

Name: Tifa
Text: I-I'm Tifa! A Support Construct! I'm honored to become a part of Suzaku!

Name: Tifa
Text: I don't think I'm a good fighter...

Name: Tifa
Text: Can I still... fight alongside everyone?

Name: Tifa
Text: Yes! Understood...! Commandant, you're such a gentle and dependable person!

Name: Tifa
Text: What to do...

Name: Tifa
Text: Okay, take a deep breath... Just like what Commandant said...

Name: Tifa
Text: Mission complete! I knew Suzaku was the best!

Name: Tifa
Text: As long as I'm with Commandant, I'm not afraid of any enemy!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant! Watch out!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... Why...

Name: Tifa
Text: It's all my fault... I'm too weak...

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... Without you, I cannot go on anymore...

Name: Liv
Text: It seemed... Tifa fell in love with her commandant...

Name: Lee
Text: She was hearing her own voice all along...

Name: Roland
Text: Come on, it's time to prove yourselves.

Name: Roland
Text: Kill... Devour... Make the power your own...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Power... The power to become free...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Give... me... the power of Ascendants...

Name: Tifa
Text: Power... is flowing...

Name: Tifa
Text: I... want more... power...

Name: Roland
Text: Should I say you've got good potential?

Name: Roland
Text: But it takes more to become an Ascendant.

Name: Roland
Text: A winner deserves a reward. You have earned yourself a letter of invitation to the next trial.

Name: Roland
Text: A wise choice. I will tell you more things that you want to know...

Name: Roland
Text: Right... The power of Ascnet.

Name: Roland
Text: This is the power of Ascnet. The more Punishing Virus you absorb... the stronger you are...

Name: Tifa
Text: I want more...

Name: Tifa
Text: Roland... Give me... more!

Name: Roland
Text: Hahaha. The first-timers are always so eager.

Name: Roland
Text: I said, you are not the only one special here. You still have one final test.

Name: Roland
Text: Destroy it and prove to me you can walk out here alive, then I will give you more of my power.

Name: Roland
Text: This power enables you to see the dawn with your own eyes. It can also help you...

Name: Roland
Text: To take revenge on the Punishing Virus... On the entire world...

Name: Roland
Text: Unleash yourself, Tifa.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: What is that "thing"... I have never seen anything so freakish...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: In just one hit... How... terrifying...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Don't fall back! Destroy it!

Name: Tifa
Text: Destroy...?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: What... is it doing?!

Name: Tifa
Text: Insects...

Name: Tifa
Text: This is the power beyond Punishing Virus...

Name: Tifa
Text: Humans are indeed ignorant and weak...

Name: Tifa
Text: If I had this power earlier... I could have saved Commandant...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The Corrupted are coming again!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Don't worry, we have deployed the Iso-Devices! Just stay inside and you'll be right!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Defeat them!

Name: Tifa
Text: Ah... Iso-Device... It reminds me of those days with Commandant again...

Name: Tifa
Text: How naive were we to believe in toys like Iso-Devices...

Name: Tifa
Text: Look at all these human toys... Infect them all, Corrupted!

Name: Tifa
Text: Right. Arm yourselves... with all the devices...

Name: Tifa
Text: Let the humans... suffer from their own naivety!

Name: Tifa
Text: Haha... Hahaha!

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, this section of Tifa's memory is heavily corrupted by the Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We need to get rid of these Punishing Virus illusions first.

Name: Lucia
Text: Are those people... from Cerberus?

Name: Lee
Text: Doesn't look like it to me.

Name: Tifa
Text: Do you want to know more about the Ascendants?

Name: Tifa
Text: Haha... Hahaha...

Name: Tifa
Text: Perhaps, you should... feel it for yourself...

Name: Kamui
Text: Darn, she's too powerful...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by the Punishing Virus...

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: You are no ordinary Corrupted. What on earth are you...?

Name: Tifa
Text: It's only been a few days. Have I changed so much?

Name: Tifa
Text: Oh well...

Name: Tifa
Text: Do you recognize me now?

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Are you... that lost Construct...? But why...

Name: Roland
Text: Has all the fire been put off? About time to go.

Name: Roland
Text: What a beautiful place. Miss Luna surely has great taste.

Name: Roland
Text: A pity that it will become a battlefield soon.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Identity: Corrupted. Threat Level: 5

Name: Terrapod
Text: Executing battle command—

Name: Roland
Text: Hm? These machines are not infected by Punishing Virus. Interesting...

Name: Roland
Text: What's the name of the machine that Gabriel hates most? Oh, "Sagemachina"... They don't look like his work though.

Name: Roland
Text: Which means this place has an owner.

Name: Roland
Text: I must pay a visit first to the owner then.

Name: Roland
Text: Luckily, I've got a gift prepared...

Name: Roland
Text: These bionic animals... look quite real.

Name: Roland
Text: I have to give credit to the Estate owner's vintage taste.

Name: Roland
Text: I see... Whenever someone gets closer, they will start to move...

Name: Roland
Text: Even the defense... has a vintage design.

Name: Roland
Text: Hello, dear owner? Have you finally noticed me?

Name: Roland
Text: I assume you have a surveillance system... Or whatever...
The estate welcomes no one. Please leave.

Name: Roland
Text: What if I don't?

Name: Roland
Text: Sensory traps?

Name: Roland
Text: Wow...

Name: Roland
Text: Like an old-school special agent movie... How exciting.

Name: Roland
Text: Haha, I just cleared everything.

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm... maybe my methods were a bit harsh.

Name: Roland
Text: Hm? They are following me.

Name: Roland
Text: I didn't expect them to be so quick in reaction.

Name: Roland
Text: You all are too early. The party isn't ready yet...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: It's an Ascendant! Ascendant Roland!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Oh gosh... Look at his readings... The concentration of Punishing Virus is insane...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: The enemy is powerful. We cannot afford to hesitate even for a split second!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Dammit... We are... no match for him...

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm, this should be all of them.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: I must... avenge my teammates... Must... let other teams know...

Name: Roland
Text: ...A sneak attack?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You bloody Corrupted... Deserves no respect!

Name: Roland
Text: How rude!

Name: Roland
Text: As I expect... Humans are despicable beings...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Keep your formation. Eliminate the Ascendant!

Name: Roland
Text: Oh, how conceited can you all be?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Dammit... Open fire!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Um... Argh! Why are you removing our Inver-Devices? Are you trying to... infect us?

Name: Roland
Text: Infect? You don't deserve that gift. I am leaving you here.

Name: Roland
Text: See this bomb in my hand? It suits your sad and sorry selves.

Name: Roland
Text: I will plant it in your body. Then...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Wait, what! What are you doing!?

Name: Roland
Text: When your teammates come and get you... You will become...

Name: Roland
Text: Hideous fireworks.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Argh... Gosh... Why... Why...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Why did I... even fight...

Name: Kamui
Text: Phew... Finally got here.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hmm? Why is there no one around?

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Greetings... You should just stay here forever.

Name: Liv
Text: The normal route leads people to this fake hall...

Name: Liv
Text: To enter the real guest hall, we must take a special route.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I locked up all those Corrupted that the Estate could not destroy inside this room.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: If those people are going to use you, I would rather you get consumed by the Corrupted...

Name: Roland
Text: Did he purposely separate us?

Name: Roland
Text: What a waste of effort. I've already found you.

Name: Kamui
Text: That voice sounds so familiar...

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey, butler. Did something happen over there?

Name: Lucia
Text: He's not answering. Let's find a way out first.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will stop you right here.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I must protect... Mr. Copperfield's... lifelong work...

Name: Roland
Text: Thanks for all the joy you brought me today, Mr. Butler.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm very sorry... But I must let Punishing Virus infect you.

Name: Roland
Text: It's all for Miss Luna.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will... never yield!

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Ugh... Aaargh!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Zack
Text: Corrupted incoming... Emma... lost... Must... protect... Emma...

Name: Zack
Text: Go away...

Name: Zack
Text: Must... find... Emma...

Name: Zack
Text: Go away!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I need to scan Zack's memory shell before attempting to repair him.

Name: Liv
Text: The structure of the memory shell is simple, but for some reason, it isn't deeply infected.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's investigate together.

Name: Liv
Text: The tag of the important record is "Operation Grand Retreat".

Name: Liv
Text: Punishing Virus has infested these data zones. The virus illusions are impacting our data query.

Name: Liv
Text: I've made some progress. All related data found. Loading now.

Name: Liv
Text: I just need to repair one more section to start reading Zack's memories.

Name: Zack
Text: Clues of... Emma's lost items...

Name: Zack
Text: Find Emma... Items...

Name: Zack
Text: Find Emma... Items...

Name: Zack
Text: Calculating... Completed... West halls...

Name: Lee
Text: Large-scale data corruption here. Leave it to me.

Name: Lee
Text: At the end of the Post-Pandemic Age, Corrupted controlled by the Punishing Virus already had military production capabilities.

Name: Lee
Text: Even with the comprehensive defense of this Estate Museum, it could not hold against the overwhelming number of Corrupted.

Name: Lee
Text: That was the situation they had to face.

Name: Zack
Text: Zack... help... Emma and Copperfield... retreat...

Name: Liv
Text: We've reached the deepest part of the data. The record shows Zack was already being infected at that time.

Name: Liv
Text: But somehow the infection was restricted and controlled at a certain level.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's clear the virus illusions here and read the final record.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Zack... We are the only ones left here.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will take you to the Static Lock. I hope Mr. Copperfield's research will work.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Before that, I just need to calm you down... I never thought we would end up like this.

Name: Liv
Text: Recreating memory now. Hope we can find clues of the Ascendant.

Name: Sister
Text: Punishing Virus injection complete... All weapon system activated... Increasing power output...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, why is she using the power of Punishing Virus, but still seen as an enemy by Corrupted?

Name: Sister
Text: I haven't fought for a long time. Looks like... this will be my last fight.

Name: Sister
Text: Gargh. This power still impacts my mind... In the end, it still tests my faith...

Name: Sister
Text: Tsk. I thought that God bloke abandoned me long ago...

Name: Liv
Text: There are way too many Corrupted. Commandant, we should retreat now!

Name: Sister
Text: I should continue... with my final cleansing...

Name: Liv
Text: Simulation in progress. Commandant, please watch closely!

Name: Liv
Text: Even in this time, her frame capabilities are as good as ours in battle.

Name: Liv
Text: But we have no information at all... I wonder how many secrets did the Church have in the past?

Name: Liv
Text: All those Corrupted came from the machine factory's direction.

Name: Liv
Text: If the source remains, their numbers would only keep growing... Exactly like what happened to us.

Name: Liv
Text: The Sister's destination... seems to be right there.

Name: Sister
Text: Phew, just like those little brats... You always look down on adults.

Name: Sister
Text: Do you know how difficult it is to be an adult...? Get out of my way!

Name: Sister
Text: Tsk.

Name: Liv
Text: The Punishing Virus' impact must have peaked around this point.

Name: Liv
Text: These are... the large firefighting robots we met before...

Name: Lee
Text: Yet, Punishing Virus modified them into arsonists. How ironic.

Name: Liv
Text: Data interfered by virus illusions...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait a sec. I'm activating emergency mode.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay. We've seen it many times. We know what to do.

Name: Liv
Text: Virus interference removed. Re-syncing now.

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, the virus infection is rooted deeply here... It needs a deep cleaning. I'll need help.

Name: Liv
Text: She managed to... hold off so many Corrupted here...

Name: Liv
Text: As if she had an endless reserve of energy... Was it because of the Punishing Virus, or her own obsession?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, it's a new combat objective!

Name: Liv
Text: This piece of broken memory probably came from when Sister was hunted by Nozzle.

Name: Liv
Text: We need to manually repair the noise while tracing the memory.

Name: Liv
Text: Recording complete. So this is when Sister met Nozzle.

Name: Liv
Text: Next section... Okay, done.

Name: Liv
Text: After ascension, even Nozzle could use tactics against its enemy.

Name: Liv
Text: The final section is also recorded.

Name: Liv
Text: There were just too many Corrupted. Even Sister had no choice but to run.

Name: Sister
Text: This is the factory's core...

Name: Sister
Text: Why would humans design such a fragile structure... Once it's destroyed, everything will be lost. How unreliable.

Name: Liv
Text: The memory data shows that Sister had already reached her infection limit.

Name: Liv
Text: But she hadn't completed her objective yet...

Name: Liv
Text: Let's finish this journey with her.

Name: Liv
Text: All missions in the current stage have been completed. Go to the memory breakpoint to start the next stage.

Name: Liv
Text: This piece of memory is already close to the end.

Name: Liv
Text: ...This should be Sister's final struggle.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's go get her final memory.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Liv
Text: The memory data videos show that Rohacchi found some spark falling into the ruins.

Name: Liv
Text: And it became very interested in it.

Name: Liv
Text: It then traced all the way toward the spark's landing point.

Name: Liv
Text: It seemed to have also activated some mechanism within the ruins...

Name: Liv
Text: To further analyze the videos in this memory data...

Name: Liv
Text: I will recreate the situation by video.

Name: Liv
Text: The memory is completely restored. Rohacchi opened this switch to move to a higher level.

Name: Liv
Text: The sealed road opened again.

Name: Liv
Text: On Rohacchi's journey, it bumped into the source of the spark and noises... It was attacked by "Roseblade".

Name: Liv
Text: As expected, all the suddenly appeared Constructs were related to Ascendants. They were also after "Tenebrion".

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I suggest we carefully study the combat data against "Roseblade". It will benefit our subsequent operations.

Name: Liv
Text: Rohacchi seemed to have met similar-looking machines.

Name: Liv
Text: It thought they were its own kind and went up to them.

Name: Liv
Text: Only to be met with sudden assault.

Name: Liv
Text: Subsequent memory data has been deciphered. Transforming to digital video now.

Name: Liv
Text: In the memory, IX-68 squatted next to one of its "kin," slowly patting its body...

Name: Liv
Text: Here, Rohacchi met Nanami...

Name: Liv
Text: And suddenly attacked...!?

Name: Liv
Text: Perhaps we could find more information about Nanami from this memory.

Name: Liv
Text: The battle didn't last long, and Nanami seemed to have moved together with Rohacchi for some time.

Name: Liv
Text: According to the memory, Rohacchi and Nanami defeated many Corrupted and returned to the upper level of the ruins.

Name: Liv
Text: Looks like the "mural" they were talking about must be nearby.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll continue with my analysis, Commandant. Please look out for any info related to the "mural" that caused them to awaken.

Name: Liv
Text: According to Rohacchi's memory, this should be where they first saw the mural.

Name: Liv
Text: But when it took Nanami there, they found nothing.

Name: Liv
Text: Apart from those machines wandering nearby.

Name: Liv
Text: Maybe the ruins collapsed because of us, so the murals also fell to another location.

Name: Liv
Text: No matter what, this piece of memory is worth studying again.

Name: Kamui
Text: I found well-preserved facilities underneath the ruins.

Name: Kamui
Text: I tried my best to stay awake.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I knew I didn't have much time left.

Name: Kamui
Text: So I had to break away from the Corrupted ASAP.

Name: Kamui
Text: One after another. Aren't you all tired??

Name: Kamui
Text: Why don't you just come all together? At least it can save some time.

Name: Kamui
Text: I must keep moving. No one can stop me.

Name: Kamui
Text: At the bottom of the ruins, I found a long and narrow corridor. Unlike the upper levels, the facilities there were kept very well.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I was exhausted from non-stop fighting.

Name: Kamui
Text: Those Corrupted seemed to have noticed this too, and launched an assault together.

Name: Kamui
Text: Tsk, the number just keeps growing...

Name: Camu
Text: Looks like you need my help.

Name: Kamui
Text: I know what you're planning. I'm not done yet!

Name: Camu
Text: Hah, you bluff. I know full well about your body.

Name: Kamui
Text: ...I will never let the virus infect me.

Name: Karenina
Text: You, stop right there!

Name: Kamui
Text: I was shocked to hear such a loud voice. Never thought she would catch up so quickly.

Name: Kamui
Text: And thanks to her, all the wandering Corrupted came up to us. The only thought I had was to never let them get me.

Name: Kamui
Text: After getting rid of all the annoying Corrupted, Camu launched his final attack too.

Name: Kamui
Text: He was far more powerful than me. I knew about that. All too well.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I had my reasons to fight too...

Name: Kamui
Text: Of course I would not fall so easily! Because I must be myself!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... You are finally here...

Name: Sister
Text: Take me along, and cleanse this planet!

Name: Camu
Text: Am I Kamui or not? That doesn't matter.

Name: Archer
Text: Your arrow is my arrow!

Name: Tyrant
Text: Find… Emma…

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Welcome... my audience...

Name: Roland
Text: You want to be an Ascendant? Ha, you are not qualified!

Name: System
Text: Initiating Punishing relay communication—

Name: Roland
Text: Hello? Can anyone hear me...? Tsk, I just don't understand how this thing works.

Name: Roland
Text: Hello...?

Name: α
Text: Speak.

Name: Roland
Text: So you've been listening... Fine. Can't you be a bit more passionate to your comrades?

Name: α
Text: If you don't have anything important, I'll hang up. I'm very busy.

Name: Roland
Text: Miss Luna sent me to ask... Well, it's not really about "us"...

Name: Roland
Text: I mean, you are crossing the Bering Strait now.

Name: α
Text: Oh really.

Name: Roland
Text: Don't you know? We noticed that your coordinates were moving through the Pacific Ocean over the last week...

Name: Roland
Text: So what's going on with you?

Name: α
Text: I'm on the back of a Narwhal.

Name: Roland
Text: Um, what...?

Name: α
Text: I've already controlled its diving module. Maybe three more days...

Name: Roland
Text: Three days then what?

Name: α
Text: It will be tamed and become my pet.

Name: Roland
Text: I remember... You started from the coastal areas of South America. Did you find it over there?

Name: α
Text: Yes.

Name: Roland
Text: You really are into weird things like this, aren't you...

Name: α
Text: It probably has a consciousness that is highly identical to a human's. I find it very interesting.

Name: α
Text: The fact that it was attacked by the Corrupted proves this.

Name: α
Text: And...

Name: Roland
Text: Yes?

Name: α
Text: The view was great there.

Name: α
Text: I'm going to focus on dealing with the Corrupted. They are interfering with my control over the Narwhal.

Name: α
Text: Meanwhile... Help me look for more information about it.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm not your bellboy, but... whatever.

Name: α
Text: The communication signal is lost... I must prevent the virus infection and restore the communication...

Name: α
Text: This horn has similar functions to a Construct's Inver-Device...

Name: α
Text: So it must be communicating with some Construct... Interesting.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv... What's wrong with them?

Name: Liv
Text: Defense terminal stopped running, causing the loss of many defense commands...

Name: Liv
Text: Without commands, they can't do anything.

Name: Lucia
Text: So the defense mechanism's stopped working. Aren't the humans here going to do something about it?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we've done it! All defense machines are back in order.

Name: Liv
Text: Remember, the defense machines are armed with powerful weapons, but they have poor armor.

Name: Lee
Text: Those civilians are watching us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't be distracted. Stick to the plan and protect the defense machines.

Name: α
Text: Very strong will... Good...

Name: α
Text: You are worthy to face my blade.

Name: α
Text: So there's no more need to talk.

Name: α
Text: Show me what you have.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, Lee, sorry. Can I leave this to you?

Name: Lucia
Text: I want to go in directly.

Name: Lucia
Text: That white-haired Ascendant is there... I can't miss the opportunity.

Name: Lee
Text: Understood. We will try our best to hold her up for you.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll be back ASAP...!

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...You aren't going through.

Name: Lee
Text: Leave her alone. We'll be your opponent!

Name: Liv
Text: No... We can't stop her... She's too powerful...!

Name: Lee
Text: Wait...! What are those... in the sea?!

Name: Rosetta
Text: In the sea...? A raging tide?!

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...Derek!

Name: Diana
Text: Gray Raven, thanks for your help...

Name: Diana
Text: Please, hold against the Corrupted!

Name: Diana
Text: Everybody, defend the port!

Name: Diana
Text: Nascal!

Name: Lee
Text: The Forest Guards are suffering casualties!

Name: Lucia
Text: Our battle isn't over!

Name: α
Text: If you call that a battle.

Name: α
Text: You are not even half as good as her.

Name: α
Text: Do you even understand what you have done...?

Name: Lucia
Text: You are my enemy, and I'm going to defeat you. This will never change!

Name: α
Text: ...You never learn.

Name: α
Text: I made her an Ascendant in order to save her.

Name: α
Text: But because of what you did...

Name: α
Text: She will become a mindless puppet controlled by the Punishing Virus instead.

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh...!

Name: Lucia
Text: But so what...? Both the Corrupted and the so-called Ascendants are the enemy of humans.

Name: α
Text: Is that so... Whatever.

Name: α
Text: Just stay there and watch. This is the difference between us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Why am I... drawn to her...

Name: α
Text: Hmph. Even as a puppet...

Name: α
Text: You still know who's the strong one...

Name: α
Text: Let's end it then.

Name: Diana
Text: It's been a while since I last came here.

Name: Lucia
Text: What is this place, Diana...?

Name: Diana
Text: During the early outbreak of the Punishing Virus, Murmansk was once very prosperous due to its geographical advantages.

Name: Diana
Text: It absorbed many inland cities and formed a commonwealth. This place was part of the northeast commonwealth.

Name: Diana
Text: And one of the birthplaces of Forest Guard.

Name: Lee
Text: There's no time for nostalgia... We are followed.

Name: Diana
Text: Smells like a prey...

Name: Lucia
Text: Forest Guards, continue tracing forward. Stay close to the target...

Name: Lucia
Text: Gray Raven will bring up the rear and deal with the enemies in the shadows!

Name: Lee
Text: The target is not far ahead, but why didn't you ask the Forest Guard to follow up?

Name: Diana
Text: You said Evan was on his feet. There's no way he could lose the Corrupted.

Name: Diana
Text: But we didn't see him when we locked on to the target...

Name: Diana
Text: Something's not right.

Name: Liv
Text: Our target is running away!

Name: Lucia
Text: Hesitation will only lead to failure. Go! Stop it!

Name: Diana
Text: Evan can't just disappear!

Name: Diana
Text: There must be other clues nearby. Forest Guards! Spread out!

Name: Diana
Text: Search everywhere! Everywhere!

Name: Diana
Text: Someone found a 5cm long, shattered titanium plate...

Name: Liv
Text: Please let me take a look!

Name: Liv
Text: ...Yes! There's human sebum and hair on the edges.

Name: Diana
Text: That's our first clue! We are on the right track!

Name: Lee
Text: Looking for clues help, but the longer we stay here, the easier we may become the target instead...

Name: Liv
Text: Lee, are you talking about the wandering Corrupted in the forest?

Name: Lee
Text: Not just the forest. They could also be among the snowy rocks, even river beds.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant! Please stay alerted!

Name: Liv
Text: I'm about to process the human pheromones found on these parts...

Name: Liv
Text: Diana, please give me Evan's weapon. I need to collect his pheromones.

Name: Liv
Text: The two samples matched perfectly! Evan was here! Now I can make a pheromone detector.

Name: Diana
Text: Is that...?

Name: Lee
Text: As long as Evan is still breathing, we can detect the pheromone he produces.

Name: Liv
Text: Found him!!

Name: Liv
Text: He's trapped on the shell of the Corrupted. Why...? Are they using him to protect themselves?

Name: Lucia
Text: Adjust your equipment immediately! Only melee weapons are allowed. We must not hurt humans!

Name: Lee
Text: I can't cut through these metal bones without hurting the rescue target.

Name: Lee
Text: Our only option is to make a strategic relocation. Take it back to the Forest Guard stronghold first, then we can think of another way.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee... How's his health doing?

Name: Lee
Text: Don't worry, he's not infected. Just a little hypothermia.

Name: Liv
Text: Strong Punishing reaction detected nearby! Everyone, watch out!

Name: Diana
Text: The Corrupted are still killing.

Name: Lucia
Text: Diana, please join us and form a line of defense together.

Name: Lucia
Text: We must not let Corrupted hurt humans.

Name: Diana
Text: The Forest Guard acknowledges Liv's strategic vision.

Name: Diana
Text: My sisters and I will do all we can to assist Gray Raven's rescue plan.

Name: Lee
Text: Calculations complete. The enemy's weak points are its supporting legs.

Name: Diana
Text: Sisters! Focus fire on the supporting legs!

Name: Liv
Text: Wait a sec. Mr. Lee didn't include Evan in his calculation...

Name: Liv
Text: Some of those legs are very close to Evan's location.

Name: Liv
Text: Please, everyone, don't hurt Evan.

Name: Liv
Text: That cross-shaped terminal has caused other devices to enter waved status.

Name: Liv
Text: Affected devices are immune to most of our attacks.

Name: Liv
Text: Attack the cross-shaped terminal continuously to remove this status from them.

Name: Lee
Text: The light beams radiated from the Heteromer Terminal will repair the Heteromer devices.

Name: Lee
Text: But be careful, these beams contain viruses that will cause our bionic nerves to have stress reaction if we get hit directly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Commandant of Gray Raven, these oddly shaped terminals are able to split.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The polar electric current circulated between them can paralyze Construct's bionic nerves and reduce their mobility.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But consecutive attacks can reverse their electrode.

Name: Watanabe
Text: If they appear in this form, try to fight them off in this way.

Name: Liv
Text: According to the map, we've landed at the designated location—

Name: Liv
Text: The data analysis cabin on space station.

Name: Liv
Text: But... our aircraft has been destroyed...

Name: Lucia
Text: If we can destroy the space station's defense system, we're able to retreat when the main forces arrive.

Name: Lee
Text: These terminals seem bizarre...

Name: Lee
Text: Those are what the report said—the corruption occurred on this space station only.

Name: Lucia
Text: You must be careful, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: This is...!

Name: Lee
Text: More authorities unlocked...

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait, that cross is guarding the gate...

Name: Liv
Text: According to my preliminary scan result, this type of enemy doesn't have a typical mechanical structure inside its body...

Name: Liv
Text: It is... composed entirely of Punishing Virus...

Name: Lee
Text: This space station must be hiding some important secrets...

Name: Lee
Text: It seems we can do more than just destroying it.

Name: Liv
Text: Guys, I've turned off the space station's remote sensing system.

Name: Lee
Text: Well done, Liv.

Name: Lee
Text: It should be able to reduce its attacks against Babylonia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yep, this is the first step for us.

Name: Liv
Text: We arrived at the second target location—

Name: Liv
Text: According to the analysis, here is the weapon control system backend...

Name: Liv
Text: After the space station being conrrupted.

Name: Lee
Text: There remain many inactivated Heteromers...

Name: Lucia
Text: If they become enemies just like...

Name: Lee
Text: Have you noticed that cross-shaped enemy in the middle?

Name: Lee
Text: Although we're not at all clear about the mechanism...

Name: Lee
Text: this type of enemy seems to control the spawning of other enemies, and—

Name: Lucia
Text: The key to dealing with our problems, I understood...

Name: Liv
Text: Those black pillars... decompose... reconstruct...

Name: Liv
Text: Every bit of the Hetero-matter of Punishing Virus in this space station could become our enemy...

Name: Lee
Text: Our attacks can make them remain inactive—

Name: Lee
Text: At least we found a way, right?

Name: Lucia
Text: Yep, let's continue in this way.

Name: Lee
Text: Finally...

Name: Liv
Text: Ah... Some Hetero-matter have regenerated energy and started to act again!

Name: Lee
Text: Tch, at this rate, we'll be drained sooner or later...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, access the control system directly. Lee—

Name: Lee
Text: I understood.

Name: Liv
Text: It's done!

Name: Liv
Text: All close-range firepower for interception purposes has been turned off!

Name: Lucia
Text: Well done, Liv.

Name: Liv
Text: The subsequent troops have begun to issue a new assembly signal.

Name: Liv
Text: We don't have to fight purely on our own at last.

Name: Watanabe
Text: However, you seem to have much trouble here.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's skip chit-chatting—

Name: Watanabe
Text: And see this as my gift for you.

Name: Liv
Text: Those enemies have shown a new attack mode.

Name: Liv
Text: But Watanabe has already been able to cope with them...

Name: Lucia
Text: You’re so strong...

Name: Lucia
Text: It feels completely different from the time we met him before.

Name: Watanabe
Text: So, is everything fine?

Name: Lee
Text: Should I say thanks to you?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hmph, still quite energetic.

Name: Watanabe
Text: ...From here on, it'll be a bit different.

Name: Liv
Text: The gate is locked by encryption, which means it's Lee's turn.

Name: Lee
Text: (Analyzing...)

Name: Lee
Text: I... see...

Name: Lee
Text: There's four corrupted terminals right in the four corners of this compartment.

Name: Lee
Text: Varied combinations can be produced by switching their respective forms...

Name: Lee
Text: Let's try different combinations.

Name: Lee
Text: The encryption has been cracked, but it causes those Heteromers to enter defense mode...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Anyway, we made certain progress.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let’s finish the remaining enemies.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Levels, huh? The mysterious blocks on the terminal might be the key.

Name: Liv
Text: It appears that interacting with the terminal can change the shape of the block...

Name: Lucia
Text: So we have to make a selection from those shapes...

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe something unexpected would happen if we leave a certain number of blocks in the corresponding shapes.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Lucia... Why is she so enthusiastic...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I see. It's a challenge, isn't it? Hmph...

Name: Watanabe
Text: All right, I accept it—Let's see who can sweep the enemies away faster.

Name: Watanabe
Text: How's it? I haven't disappointed you, have I?

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Impressive.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's work together to protect Liv from the last wave of attacks.

Name: Lucia
Text: On it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Maybe my life is for this moment...

Name: Lucia
Text: What did you say, Watanabe?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Nothing.

Name: Korolev
Text: You... haven't complied with... the regulations...

Name: Korolev
Text: Now... Kids... come to the confinement cabin with Korolev...

Name: Korolev
Text: Accept your punishment...

Name: Korolev
Text: If any resistance occurs... Korolev will follow the rules... to adopt the minimum enforcement measures...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, this... is...?

Name: Liv
Text: It's not composed of Hetero-matter. It's a real Corrupted... I'm afraid...

Name: Lee
Text: It is the annoying broadcast we've been listening to all the time?

Name: Liv
Text: But, in such high viral density environment... Can a machine truly maintain its original consciousness?

Name: Liv
Text: It strikes me that... it's been held in captivity alone... What could be the reason for that...

Name: Lee
Text: We might have no answers to it... All I know now is that we only have one choice...

Name: Korolev
Text: Confinement...

Name: Liv
Text: The surrounding gravity becomes abnormal...

Name: Lee
Text: The core of space station... Gravity room. We finally made it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: It's the gravity experiment here that produces Hetero-matter—

Name: Watanabe
Text: Who would have thought humans would not only suffer from Punishing Virus but also help it create a new form...

Name: Lucia
Text: Watanabe... Thank you for fighting with us all this way...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Don't worry, I won't leave until the threat of this space station is resolved.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I know those enemies were just warm-up for you.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's show our true power to them now.

Name: Liv
Text: These crosses... appear again...

Name: Liv
Text: It's like their presence is conveying a certain "message"...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we can't go any further...

Name: Lee
Text: This is an artificially designed area. Now that we've dispatched the enemies—

Name: Lee
Text: The mechanism should be able to resume normal operation.

Name: Lee
Text: Try to get close to the edge.

Name: Liv
Text: What a stunning design...

Name: Liv
Text: It is achieved only by precise gravity manipulation...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I remember there's gravity generators inside Babylonia as well.

Name: Liv
Text: Yes... But I never thought I would be so close to its prototype...

Name: Lucia
Text: I've tried it out. It's fine to go—

Name: Lucia
Text: Keep on going!

Name: Liv
Text: This is...

Name: Lee
Text: Some kind of mechanism again... Should take a look at it.

Name: Lee
Text: It's a device used to lock those rings.

Name: Lee
Text: In such a way, it can stabilize the rings and gravity core.

Name: Lucia
Text: Those rings are nearly the same. Let's continue in this way.

Name: Lee
Text: Yes...

Name: Ayla
Text: I'm not sure what would happen if you operated it incorrectly...

Name: Ayla
Text: But please follow my instructions.

Name: Ayla
Text: The first message is—

Name: Ayla
Text: "Two into one".

Name: Ayla
Text: Do you have any idea about it?

Name: Lee
Text: It seems to be related to these light beams...

Name: Lee
Text: I'll try to crack it forcibly, but it's going to take some time.

Name: Lee
Text: It might trigger a higher level of defense system. Anyway, let's get through this together, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: It worked.

Name: Liv
Text: Miss Ayla, please provide the next instruction!

Name: Ayla
Text: Okay, the next message is—

Name: Ayla
Text: "From abstract to concrete".

Name: Liv
Text: Abstract and concrete... We've encountered enemies that gave us similar feelings.

Name: Liv
Text: Which means... "Starting from the abstract"?

Name: Liv
Text: Let's do it then!

Name: Liv
Text: We can move on now!

Name: Liv
Text: The path is blocked off again.

Name: Ayla
Text: As you can see... There's three movable mechanisms...

Name: Liv
Text: Yes!

Name: Ayla
Text: According to the record, the tip here is—

Name: Ayla
Text: "The beginning is the end".

Name: Liv
Text: Hmm, I think I've figured it out...

Name: Lee
Text: Same as before, I'll try to crack it forcibly.

Name: Lee
Text: As expected, you solved the puzzle first, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, here we're again...

Name: Ayla
Text: It should be the last mechanism for this ring.

Name: Lucia
Text: Please tell us the last tip.

Name: Ayla
Text: Okay, listen carefully—

Name: Ayla
Text: "Divide is complete".

Name: Lucia
Text: It's getting hard to understand...

Name: Lucia
Text: But experience told us we have to create a certain pattern using these light beams.

Name: Lucia
Text: Although I'm not quite certain about it, I think we should create as much "divide" as possible.

Name: Lee
Text: Backend hacking is also in progress.

Name: Lucia
Text: So, it's... correct?

Name: Liv
Text: Yep, well done!

Name: Watanabe
Text: The mechanism that controls the rings appeared.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's resume.

Name: Lee
Text: Only a few rings left.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hm, we'd better hurry. Other troops should be on their way now.

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter what enemies are waiting for us at the end,

Name: Lucia
Text: This time, we have many teammates on our side.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hmm... maybe it's implying that we have to create a certain pattern.

Name: Liv
Text: Two into... Maybe it's something about the number of light beams.

Name: Watanabe
Text: One could represent a circle, but what does it have to do with the tip?

Name: Lee
Text: Separated in two paths, a single straight line. It feels like we almost find the answer.

Name: Liv
Text: If it's translated literally... the beginning represents the end?

Name: Lee
Text: If the cross lines are connected... It kind of makes sense.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Ring structure...? Could it be a clue to solve this puzzle?

Name: Lucia
Text: Making it a circulation seems to match the tip...

Name: Lee
Text: Connecting it in another way might worth a try...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Maybe we should make the straight lines at the beginning into something else?

Name: Lucia
Text: Light beams... Prism... Three points... Perhaps we can indeed change something...

Name: Liv
Text: Make that single... No, two merged light beams split. Perhaps... Maybe...

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I will hack into it from the backend now.

Name: Liv
Text: The enemies this time seem different...

Name: Liv
Text: They haven't decomposed upon being defeated. Instead—

Name: Liv
Text: They entered a state similar to hibernation... Energy flowed steadily inside their body...

Name: Lee
Text: No more path occurs ahead. Perhaps it is because of this kind of enemy.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I don't know what you're thinking of it, but we'd better act with caution.

Name: Lee
Text: After all, this enemy has appeared with certain modifications.

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait... Are they... coming to us?

Name: Liv
Text: But they haven't shown any intention to assault...

Name: Watanabe
Text: It's impossible for Punishing Virus not to show any aggressiveness.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Unless...

Name: Liv
Text: What's concerning you, Watanabe?

Name: Lee
Text: I'll speak for him—Unless it's their "choice".

Name: Lucia
Text: Punishing Virus' choice? You mean Punishing Virus is able to make a choice?

Name: Lucia
Text: It's a feature of possessing consciousness. But...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I don’t know... I'm afraid no one can explain this situation clearly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We can only go forward now.

Name: Liv
Text: The path occurs. The energy inside these enemies has been transferred to the mechanism...

Name: Liv
Text: And flowed into its central core.

Name: Watanabe
Text: It sounds terribly bad...

Name: Lucia
Text: That core is the primary target in this assault ordered by Babylonia.

Name: Lucia
Text: At least... We're getting closer to our ultimate target.

Name: Liv
Text: No more new enemies, Lucia.

Name: Lee
Text: Then, this is the last mechanism.

Name: Lee
Text: After passing through this, we'll face the largest Heteromer parasitic on the gravity core.

Name: Lucia
Text: Any hesitation is unnecessary at this point.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Gray Raven, prepare for battle!

Name: Construct
Text: Mr. Lee truly never misses a shot!

Name: Lee
Text: I won't waste a single bullet.

Name: Lee
Text: Mission complete. Prepare to retreat. Commandant should be waiting for us outside here.

Name: Construct A
Text: Mr. Lee, it seems we've been going round in circles...

Name: Lee
Text: This way.

Name: Construct B
Text: Hey, I heard Mr. Lee has no sense of direction. It isn't true, is it? (Softly)

Name: Lee
Text: Remaining Heteromers discovered ahead. Everyone, ready to engage.

Name: Constructs
Text: Roger!

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, we've arrived at the designated location. Nearby devices show apparent traces of being tampered by Gabriel.

Name: Lee
Text: All devices are expected to be recovered in five minutes.

Name: Lee
Text: After this, Engineering Force can "touch down" on the space station and carry out their duties...

Name: Construct
Text: Mr. Lee! Nearby devices have returned to operation all of a sudden!

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk, what a tedious parting gift.

Name: Liv
Text: This... This is!?

Name: Lee
Text: A hideous appearance indeed.

Name: Liv
Text: Punishing concentration surging!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, please stay back. This enemy has extremely high lethality.

Name: Liv
Text: It's not working. Our attacks hardly deal any damage to it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Sounds like a train is approaching...

Name: Liv
Text: This train is...?

Name: Lee
Text: Focus. The enemies aren't finished yet.

Name: Liv
Text: Punishing concentration continues to surge... It's corrupting the new train!

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, prepare sufficient Serum. We'll go after it.

Name: Lee
Text: There's an excessive amount of Corrupted, which will slow us down.

Name: Lee
Text: I propose that we adjust the operation, passing through inside the train to intercept our target.

Name: Liv
Text: By doing so, we can avoid the risk of moving on the rooftop of a high-speed train.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...A decorated glass cupola.

Name: Liv
Text: It's beautiful.

Name: Lucia
Text: We can go inside the train from here as we also have to get in touch with the owners of this train.

Name: Liv
Text: The mechanoids... are fighting the Corrupted?

Name: Lee
Text: Those mechanoids should have been used in repairs.

Name: Lucia
Text: Secure the train compartments. We can't let them reach the crowded area.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll help handle the threats coming from another side. You guys can stop that large prey outside.

Name: Liv
Text: That Corrupted in the corner is corrupting other mechanoids in normal operation!

Name: Lucia
Text: We can't leave it alone.

Name: Liv
Text: Please beware of the Corrupted coming down from the ceiling.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's not much time left. We must stop the Rail Heterozygote, otherwise, this train will be in great danger.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll bring up the rear.

Name: Lee
Text: Beware, they're charging at us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Ready to fight!

Name: Celica
Text: Bianca, your current location was once a temporary supply deport.

Name: Celica
Text: According to the signal sent back by Liv, that train will pass through here soon.

Name: Celica
Text: I also have a piece of bad news for you. The leader of Gray Raven seems to have gone missing.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Lucia?

Name: Celica
Text: Anyway, your prime objective remains to secure the train station, then you can move when you find a good timing.

Name: Celica
Text: I will keep updating you on the target info.

Name: Bianca
Text: Target confirmed. Prepare to execute the purification mission.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's been a long time since I used this frame.

Name: Bianca
Text: Hope I can still handle it.

Name: Bianca
Text: The tunnel portal is sealed by a gate.

Name: Bianca
Text: It doesn't stand to reason that a gate is set to block off the rail in a train station.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's like a device added at a later stage.

Name: Bianca
Text: I have to find a way to turn it on, otherwise when the train arrives...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Still works.

Name: Bianca
Text: Everything seems to have remained the same.

Name: Bianca
Text: Then, I only have to wait on the second floor.

Name: Bianca
Text: Gronin Station was once its name.

Name: Bianca
Text: According to the vaguely discernible information, it was a rare oasis in this boundless desert.

Name: Bianca
Text: As a temporary supply deport, it was a lively venue that provided supplies and energy for the trains during the Golden Age.

Name: Bianca
Text: After the outbreak of the virus, it was also used as a temporary refugee camp for the victims of this disaster.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Although it has already become a nest of Corrupted.

Name: Bianca
Text: But it can still resist wind erosion and manage to maintain its original appearance.

Name: Bianca
Text: Not much time left. I have to destroy the remaining Corrupted as soon as possible.

Name: Bianca
Text: This area is full of Corrupted too...

Name: Bianca
Text: The situation is more serious than I thought.

Name: Bianca
Text: Target confirmed in the Hawkeye sight distance.

Name: Bianca
Text: That is Rail Heterozygote...

Name: Bianca
Text: This location is not suitable for shooting, and its weak points are still uncertain.

Name: Bianca
Text: If I could get closer.

Name: Bianca
Text: Lucia?

Name: Lucia
Text: Bianca, jump!

Name: Bianca
Text: It's still out of the shooting range. We have to move closer.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hold me tight!

Name: Bianca
Text: Target locked. Ready to break its defense.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll drive it. You concentrate on your work!

Name: Liv
Text: We did it! It's stopped!

Name: Lee
Text: ...But the cost is too high.

Name: Liv
Text: Lee...

Name: Lee
Text: I know. It isn't the time for sorrow as the mission isn't over yet.

Name: Lucia
Text: Right, we have to root out the potential threats left by us.

Name: Bianca
Text: Ready for sniping. Everyone, please assume your position.

Name: Rat
Text: Squeak—! Rat's got some goodies for you!

Name: Rat
Text: Squeak—! Rat's got some goodies for you—!

Name: Rat
Text: Wait a sec! Why are they beating up my bro?

Name: Rat
Text: Whatever...! The goodies are delivered, squeak—!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lucia……
彼女はLuciaにしか興味がないらしいです。しかし今のLuciaは……

Name: The other Lucia
Text: 私は大丈夫です……あなたたちは指揮官の傍に……

Name: Lucia
Text: Though it is interesting to see you struggle... My patience still has a limit.

Name: Lucia
Text: Enough... Let us end this farce.

Name: Lee
Text: Kuku, look how fat you are! Let us get some exercise!

Name: 库库
Text: Ku?

Name: Lee
Text: Leeフの為に頑張りましょうよ。怖くないし、痛くありません。大丈夫。

Name: 库库
Text: Ku! Kuku, kuku!!

Name: 库库
Text: Kukukuku...

Name: Lee
Text: This should be small enough now. Alright, job done!

Name: 库库
Text: Ku...

Name: 精鋭侵蝕体
Text: Urgh—Uuurgh!

Name: 侵蝕体
Text: Urgh!

Name: Nanami
Text: Whoa, so many bad boys here. Nanami is a good girl who refuses to use force!

Name: Nanami
Text: Then I should cut more trees quietly without being noticed by them!

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah! Go!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm, it looks good, and is far from the Corrupted.

Name: Nanami
Text: Even if my emit some noises, they won’t notice when they’re cutting trees, right?

Name: Nanami
Text: Okay! Start!

Name: Nanami
Text: These guys... they just won’t stop even if they are cutting nothing...

Name: Nanami
Text: It's getting boring. Nanami should bring the Christmas tree back! Bye bye!

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30>One!</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=50>Two!</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=50>3!</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=70><color=#ffff00>Go!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=80><color=#ff0000>Stop!</color></size>

Name: α
Text: If this is how you decided...

Name: α
Text: Come.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, please allow me to...

Name: Lee
Text: Beware. There’s something beneath the harbor.

Name: Leeフ
Text: Accessing surveillance data... This is...!?

Name: α
Text: ...The waves are coming faster than expected.

Name: α
Text: I cannot waste time here, the Narwhal is in danger.

Name: α
Text: Connecting to the Ascnet comes with its price, but...

Name: α
Text: You do not have the will for it.

Name: α
Text: Domination, or submission. You are undoubtedly the latter.

Name: Rosetta
Text: This arrogant look...

Name: α
Text: You are already a slave of the Ascnet, Roland...

Name: α
Text: The ascension, failed.

Name: Rosetta
Text: You pitiful Ascendant...! Leave your frame behind!
